1.content:
So, who gains?


Name and title: James, Crown Prince of Mercia
Age: 19
Complexion: Pale white
Hair: Blonde, shaggy
Height: 5’9”
Weight: 9.8 stone ---- 134 lbs
Body type: Slender – Average
Description: James is the Crown Prince of Merica, the elder of Queen Mary’s two younger brothers, and the elder son of the former King. The death of his father before his coming of age resulted in his ambitious and charismatic sister acceding the throne instead. James is the arguably the most attractive boy in all of Merica, and the most fashionable male at court, though not in the least vain. He is unambitious, peaceable, and caring – especially to his younger brother George.



Name and title: George, Prince of Mercia
Age: 14
Complexion: Pale
Hair: Dirty blonde
Height: 5’5”
Weight: 10.2 stone ---- 142 lbs
Body type: Average to chubby
Description: George is the youngest child of the former King of Mercia, and the younger brother of current Queen. George was his father’s favourite, and regularly received gifts and treats whilst his siblings did not. George’s childhood years were mostly filled with eating the delicious foods of the royal court and have resulted in him becoming rather fat, though he has easily kept his attractive looks. George’s stomach is round and soft, and is frequently bloated as George add’s to his belly at banquets, sparingly the rest of his body show little sings of being fat.



Name and title: Laurence, King of Aquitaine
Age: 21
Complexion: Pale
Hair: Dark brown
Height: 5’11”
Weight: 8.13stone ---- 135 lbs
Body type: Skinny
Description: Laurence is the young King of Castile, his father having died when he was less than 2 years of age meant that for most of his live Aquitaine has been ruled by Regents. Even dressed in the finest robes of a King, Laurence still struggles to feel and look the part. He is skinny, and childlike in appearance, and shy around most apart from his family. His attractive baby face, gains the eye of many courtiers, as does his ‘power’, but thus far Laurence has shown little interest in the opposite sex. As he struggles to rule in the face of his privy council, war with neighbouring Merica, and it’s strong Queen seems inevitable.



Name and title: Ferdinand, Prince of Castile
Age: 16
Complexion: Olive tan
Hair: Curly dark brown
Height: 5’10”
Weight: 10.5 stone ---- 145 lbs
Body type:Average
Description: Ferdinand of Castile is the son of the heir to the Castile throne, but as his grandfather the king grows frailer by the day, the line of succession is frequently discussed, with the king’s second son, Ferdinand’s uncle seeming a likely candidate to challenge his own claim. At 16 little of this bothers Prince Ferdinand, as a premier royal in Castile he flamboyantly enjoys a life of luxury, controversially playing around with men and women alike and frequently appearing in public with little more than underwear. With luxury comes eating, the thin and lanky boy he was in his youth has gone, with his intense gorging on delicacies his stomach has slowly become soft and podgy.
1.title: Who gains?

choices: It was true, James had gained a couple of pounds.
It was true, James had gained 14 pounds.
It was true, James had gained 20 pounds.
George was only teasing, James hadn't gained anything.
Follow a secondary character from James' story.
11.content:
It was at times like this that James was so appreciative of the Royal Palace's sophisticated heating system, getting dressed or bathing would be a freezing task this time of year otherwise. He had swung out of bed and through off his night gown and was dressed only in his oddly elaborate underwear, by the look of the sky he had once again slept in far too long.

James wearing only his underwear was a sight that most girls, and some guys, at court would pay to see. Despite his lack of masculine features, he was considered one of the most attractive boys in Mercia. His pale skin, and shaggy blonde hair became a look that many replicated, embarrassingly even some women did so too.

"Huh" James replied to a slight knocking he could hear on his side door, the knocker didn't bother to wait for a real response. Prince George barged in as brazen and confidently as he did almost everything, he wasn't noted for his tact or sense of privacy. But then he was James' younger brother, it didn't matter at all in this case. Like James George was dressed only in his underwear, though it was longer and far less elaborate than James'.

"Have you only just got up" George asked.

"Only?... Yes, but then clearly so have you" James replied.

"I've been up for ages" George said, lounging onto a sofa near the fire."Your just lucky Mary hasn't called for you"

"Make yourself comfortable" James said sitting in a chair placed opposite the sofa.

"Man you've gotten lazy... it's nearly half eleven" George teased.

"Hardly" was all he said in response, it was half eleven that was slightly lazy - even by George's standards.

"Are too... that's not to mention how fat you've gotten" George added.

"Fat!?" James said in shock.
11.title: James, Crown Prince of Mercia

choices: James decides to get in better shape.
James trys to put the subject out of his head
James doesn't care, and ends up gaining more weight
111.content:
"I'm not!" James said indignantly. He suspected that George was only teasing him, though he was equally blunt with the truth as he was when mocking someone. James had recently taken a particular liking to sugary deserts, and had unsurprisingly actually gained a few of pounds; the lack of any exercising meant this weight was almost certainly all fat. Though it was by no means visible.

George stood up and squeezed onto the chair next to James. "Man, your easy to mock" George chuckled.

"I can never tell when your teasing or, or just being tactless" James explained.

George laughed, "I was partly being tactless" He added "you have started to get podgy" with his right hand he pinched about an inch of James belly, illustrating that his stomach had now gotten a small amount of fat on it, despite his very slender body.

James pushed Georges hand aside and placed his hand on his stomach, he was actually surprised by the amount of flab on his belly, he could feel that his stomach felt quite soft; at his age he should really be exercising and toning up his upper body. For that reason pointing out that his George was chubbier, was pointless. It didn't matter nearly as much at Georges age, even though when he was that age James had been very slender. "I'm still slender" was all James said, patting his chest.

"Cousin John is well toned, and he's a few months younger than you" George said.

"He is?" James asked

"Yeah... how do you not know? He's always spending leisure time shirtless" George explained "I guess he likes to show off."

Come to think of it he did know, despite rarely seeing cousin John exercise he could remember seeing just how well toned he was, John had a model physique and was likely far fitter than James.
111.title: James had only gained a couple of pounds.

1112.content:
James decided to put the whole subject to the back of his head, as George went for a bath and he went to get dressed. It wasn't even as if he'd gained more than a couple of pounds. He certainly didn't want to spend an excessive amount of exercising just to get a toned physique, he was and always had been slender. He went into his dressing room where his footman was waiting to dress him, as usual James was going with an extravagant fashionable choice of clothing complete with a jewled tiara.

He headed down to the main court rooms, it was lunch time but relatively quite, most couriers, including the Queen and Dowager Queen, were at the jousting tournament, but the rooms were still set for lunch. From the corner of his eye he spied his cousin John sitting down with a drink, he grabbed a plate and a slice of cake and sat down opposite him, as he sat down, John stood up and bowed respectively, John stood at an inch taller than James, his hair dark and skin pale with a tint of a tan, James had forgotten how good looking he was.

"Your royal highness" John said, his tone calm and smooth.

James nodded his head, and John sat back down. "I'm surprising your not at the jousting"

"'I'm not very good at jousting" John quickly admitted, "how come your not?"

"Same... though I'm worse, than 'not very good'. I also have a slight aversion to blood" James chuckled.

"Haha... I can see why you don't joust in that case" John said, "I remember you use to be good at dueling when you were younger."

"Yeah, I still duel from time to time. I also quite like wrestling. They're both 'clean' forms of combat" he explained "or cleanish atleast"

"Wresting huh?... I've always liked wrestling too"

"Cool" James said wiping his mouth as he finished his cake, within seconds a servant took his plate away and replaced it with a bowel of chocolate ice cream.

"Perhaps, we should wrestle at sometime" John suggested "It would be a great honour"

"Sure, that sounds great. How long are you at court for."

"For the foreseeable future... can't see my self leaving unless there's a war." John added.

The two chatted for another half an hour until James had finished his lunch, the two rose from their seats together and headed towards the the doors.
1112.title: James trys to put the subject out of his head

11121.content:
It had been a busy week, many court functions, lunches, parties, that sort of thing. John and James had seen each other on and off all week, but had agreed to meet up for that wrestling match before lunch eight days after they first discussed it. James rushed along to the gymnasium where he and John were meeting up, James had decided to wear far simpler clothes today, what he normally wore was by no means suitable for wrestling. Unsurprisingly John was already there.He gave a respectful bow as James gracefully entered the room.

"Your highness" John was dressed very similarly to James, and looked like he had already started preparing.

"Sorry I'm running late" James said immediately starting his own stretches.

"Not a problem" John replied.

After about 5 minuets they spent preparing the two entered the ring, John removed his simple jerkin revealing his beautifully sculpted body, James had briefly forgotten they were doing it shirtless, but quickly and calmly he removed his own simple white jerkin and threw it to the ground behind him. The two sized each other up, James was certain that John would win, but John wasn't taking any chances - he wasn't in the slightest bit arrogant.

The two entered the ring, and circled each other before grabbing one another's shoulders and pushed, before long John gained the upper hand and flipped James over and jumped onto him, they tousled on the floor, several times James managed to come back and turn John to his side, their two bodies touched chest to chest, and James could feel just how toned John was. Before long John gained the advantage and got James into a position and held him there until they called time. John stood first, and raised his hand and helped James up.

"Good match" James said, panting.

"Your fast" John pointed out, as he also panted.

"Haha, yeah that's the style I'm best at" James said.

"Your also heavier than you look, I was thinking you'd be about nine stone" John enquired.

"No!" James chuckled "I don't know my exact weight, but I'd say I'm over 10 stone"

"I'm about 11" John replied, "your are significantly lighter than me, but you took me by surprise were I first tossed you"

"I felt you tense slightly as you lifted me" James commented.

"Almost fell backwards under your weight, that stone was quite a difference, especially when it comes as a surprise.

James had said 10 stone, though thinking back at the last weeks events it could have been a little bit more. "I'm not sure I could have lifted you easily, had I got the opertunity, sadly my extra weight isn't muscle like yours"

"Your chest felt a little soft as it pressed against mine" John admitted "but you can't be both slender and toned"

Compared to how he was when George had mentioned his weight earlier last week, James' stomach was even softer and podgyer, he had eatern allot of cakes and other deserts over the week. Even when he lunched with John he noticed that while he had a couple of slices of cake and some ice cream and a drink, John had simple bread.
11121.title: The following week.

111212.content:
James casually entered the bathing chamber, it was quite, apart from guards posted at various places this part of the palace was deserted, the bathing chamber it's self was empty, thank god. James slipped off his jerkin and underwear and slipped into the already prepared bath.

It could have gone better, he was trounced. He was able to fight back at the odd brief moment, but John rarely let up, he rarely gave any opportunity for a counter move. As soon as he flipped James over that was it, he was sure that he would be unable to win. Not the best mindset to have of course, though his concentration was knocked off balance by seeing John's physique in the flesh. It was a far cry from his own skinny form which had always aloud him the advantage of speed and maneuverability. Of course, of late James had put on weight, and had gotten slightly podgy in the stomach. As far as he could tell this didn't effect the outcome of the match detrimentally, but it must have made him look like a softer target.. in more ways than one.

James sighed... he would have to face John again, they'd already agreed to it now, and he couldn't see himself beating John next time either. Worse, as their bodies had touched James felt turned on. He couldn't believe himself for having such a thought, about another boy. James shock his head in the water as he tried to think about something else. It would be difficult, especially knowing he was going to see John's bare flesh again.

After about half an hour James rose from the bath, covered himself in towels and returned to his room, instead of getting dressed he retired straight to bed and got servants to bring him his dinner.
111212.title: James goes to bathe.

1112121.content:
James was there first this time, getting warmed up. If he was to beat John this time he had to stratagise, John was simply to strong for him. Out of the corner of his eyes, he could see John approaching in very similar, if not the same, clothes as the last time.

"Your Highness" John said with a respectful bow, upon approach.

"Cousin John" James replied politely, carefully slipping off his jerkin, to reveal his bare upper body.

John looked intrigued at James,when dressed, or covered he looked incredibly slender and perfect. When stripping off his top half, James was in fact not, his chest appeared soft, his belly button fairly deep and his lower belly surprisingly chubby. John wasn't sure, but he was sure that James looked slightly fatter than the previous week, albeit the change different, but being blessed with a keen eye John rarely missed these things. Convinced he'd been looking for too long, he hastily pulled off his own jerkin.

"We should weigh ourselves to make sure we are informed" James suggested, eyeing up the scales behind John. Last time, the difference in their weight had been a disadvantage for him, "it's important we go into a fair match knowing, rather than guessing"

"Wise idea" John replied. He steped onto the scale first, after 30 seconds the weights took to align the needle stopped at 11.0 stone [154 lbs).

John was more or less exactly as he said he was, now was James's turn, he confidently strode onto the scale. Because the weights had to realign this was going to take a little bit longer, after about a minuet the needle finally stopped at:
1112121.title: Meeting John a week later.

11121212.content:
The needle finally settled at 10.9 stone [149 pounds].

"More than I was expecting" John replied, as James stepped of the scales quietly.

"Yeah, a bit" James replied calmly, if he was shocked he was doing a good job of hiding it.

"I thought you said you were about 10 stone.... well at least this way we're close!" John consolidated.

"Perfectly true" James smiled "Ready when you are"

The two stepped into the ring and immediately started grappling, James saw an opening and attempted to flip John over. Sadly he wasn't strong enough for such a quick move, he lifted John off his feat, before loosing his balance and being knocked over by John. the two started grappling and twisting on the floor, there skin touching, and there eyes at the same level. It would be endurance which would win this match, unsurprisingly John had more endurance.

"Good match" James said happily, he may have lost this game but he performed better than in the previous game. Still panting he took a seat on the bench beside the ring, and was soon joined by John.

"It was" John replied.

"Easier to lift one another knowing the weight" James noted.

"Certainly." John paused briefly "Excuse me if it's out of place your highness but"

"No, it's fine John... we're cousins"

"Have you put on a bit of weight recently?" John asked with a kind tone in his voice.

"What makes you think so?"

"I saw you a couple of times during the summer without a shirt, and you were really quite thin." John said carefully. "And now you seem chubbier... i mean you couldn't tell without seeing your bare chest, but right now for example"

"I have been eating snacks far more of late" James admitted. He seemed oblivious, yet unsurprised by the comments.

"I could feel it... here" John replied placing his hand flat on James's soft stomach and jiggling it slightly"
11121212.title: 10 stone 9 pounds [149 pounds]

choices: He'd gained a good few pounds.
He'd only gained a pound or so.
1113.content:
"I suppose so" James replied casually, "I guess I hadn't ever really thought about it.". That was true in part, he hadn't really ever thought about it, mind you John was so attractive now... his toned physique, his soft tan, his York smile. James couldn't help feeling turned on when ever seeing him shirtless.

George lounged a couple ore minuets before he briskly disappeared back in the direction in which he came. James used the opportunity to get up and dressed for the rest of the day, and after being dressed into one of his finest tunics, trousers, jerkin and of course hats he left his bedroom chamber to the maids who were beginning to tidy up. All the way down stairs cousin John was on his mind... damn George for putting a sexualised John into his head. God forbid the day he has to take a women into his bed, he couldn't think about guys and only guys like this for the rest of his life.

The week was fairly mundane, there were court events, meetings with important nobles and foreign diplomats, nothing particularly exciting. James had spent them talking with courtiers, laughing and jokes both funny and unfunny and gossiping over drinks, and the finest foods in all the kingdom. In set was the time he spent young ladies of court, letting them fawn over him, and of course flirting with the odd handsome young lord, knight of squire. For much of the time he couldn't help thinking about John and his hot body, he'd only seen John once, in full suit of armour, and in their short conversation James was almost willing John to invite him into his bed. But alas nothing.

James awoke late the next Saturday morning, he hadn't retired until gone midnight the previous night on account of a grand feast held in honour of the the Gonfaloniere of Siècle's final day of his state visit. The meal had been 34 courses, by the time it was over James was stuffed. He should have known he'd eaten too much from each course, It was good that he'd not drunk too much otherwise the contents of his stomach would likely have been a problem for the poor maids to clean up the following morning. He lifted up the duvet and slid to the end of the bed and sat, while he pulled off his pyjama shirt and bottoms. James was no longer bloated as he had been the previous evening, there was however a small but distinct roll of flab protruding onto his underwear.
1113.title: James doesn't care, and ends up gaining more...

choices: James notices (or George points it out)
11132.content:
James stomach was significantly flabbier than the previous week, when George had made his quip, he had surely gained a good couple of pounds more, and that wasn't just thanks to the feast the previous night. He'd spent much of the week at court functions, every time he usually a drink and a snack in each hand as he spent hours listening, and joking and boring himself with talking with courtiers. And the food that James picked was rarely the healthy option, if there was such a thing. His food of choice, depending on the time of day, was ether cakes and pastries, or the meats.

As he stood up it was obvious that James was still slender, he had a thin waste line, and his stomach barely protrude at all. Looking at his midriff of course, it was evident to anyone who saw him half dressed regularly that he'd gained weight, especially at his deepening belly button, and as James walked across the room his belly jiggled ever so slightly. All in all he must have gained about half a stone, in the past month or so, including the pounds he added in this exercise free week. Meaning he would now be getting on for ten and a half stone.
11132.title: He'd gained a good few pounds.

111321.content:
The extra weight wasn't enough for James to notice however, after having a morning bath he went into his wardrobe where his valets were waiting to dress him. It was almost certain that the two young boys had noticed, Lord Richard and Lord Harry, the two younger sons of the Duke of Balfour, had served as James' pages for almost 4 years in which time they had seen James shirtless on a regular basis... more so than most people. When Lord Harry reached 17 Mary agreed to their father the Duke that both him and his 16 year old brother would take on further duties as the Crown Princes valets. Thus for four months they had been dressing James, seeing his naked body up close everyday, often several times each day. Though young, they were tactful. If they did notice that James had gained weight they didn't say anything, neither did they indicate that they noticed, as was expected of servants, however high born.

They dressed him extravagantly as always, donning him in scarlet stockings, a white silk shirt and a intricately embroidered jerkin. James had been called to court by the Queen herself, the privy council and all the nobles in the city were to be there. It was sure to be an important and interesting affair.
111321.title: James doesn't notice.

1113211.content:
James arrived in the Throne room promptly though the door at the back, behind the throne, which was only accessible to the Royal Family. As hoped he had beaten Mary and most members of the privy council. The Throne room had three thrones always in place, in the centre on the highest step was the Grand Throne it's self, sat on by the monarchs of Mercia. To the right and left a few steps lower were two smaller thrones, these were traditionally sat in by the royal consort, on the right, and the heir on the left. Since Queen Mary wasn't married, the Dowager Queen sat to her right, and until such time Mary has an heir the seat to the left was James'. For Court sessions like this the there were six extra seats placed lower down the dais for the members of the privy council.

James took his seat as more members of the court began to arrive, first the Dowager Duchess of Montrose, the Duke of Balfour, the Dowager Queen and various other courtiers who were to stand before the throne. With Prince James and the Dowager Queen already present the Royal Guard had taken up position in front of the throne, safeguarding the royal family and the members of the queen's government.

Eventually as the Court started to get busy the Queen herself arrived forcing the room into intimidate silence. She was flanked by two ladies in waiting, and followed closely behind by the Queen's personal Royal Guards, who were armoured in magnificent red armour, the colour of the royal families armorial. James and all the other seated stood and bowed (and curtsied) as the Queen approached. They didn't rise again until the Queen had sat upon the throne and indicated that they may do so.

"As many Lords and ladies of the court might already now" Queen Mary's voice was cold and stoic, "Aquitaine soldiers have crossed further into Mercia from the occupied region of Montrose. Not on the orders of weak King Laurence, but of his cousin the Duke de Lyon"

The court issued it's unavoidable gasps of anger, horror, annoyance. As was tradition. James suspected most already knew, regardless this was news to get excited about, so he didn't blame their reaction, even if it was but to curry favour.

"General Ser Menson, please read your report to the court"

"At once Your Majesty" he rose from his seat and stood before Mary and bowed once again and started speaking, his words spoke of how the Aqutiaine's had burned Montrosian villages near the border, how they had pillaged towns in the Mercian mainland. How they were planning to send forces to race to Rochester... here in the centre of Mercia.

"The Royal Army has three legions dispatched to intercept the invading army at the souther border" Ser Manson continued, "a further two has been dispatched to relieve Monrose"

Queen Mary looked as furious as James imagined she felt, "We can assume with some degree of certainty that by the end of the week Laurence will no longer be King of Aqutiaine."

Now that was a blow, Aqutiaine had been mailable, and even controllable while the pitiable Laurence had been on the throne. Should the Duke de Lyon be King, he will be able to present a far more powerful and united force against Mercia.

"Prince James... step forward." Mary said.

"Yes your Majesty" James walked down the dias onto the marble floor of the throne room and knelt before throne.

"My dear brother" Mary said caringly, "I am sending you to Saxony to meet your future bride, Archduchess Maria, who you shall marry upon your return to Rochester"

James was suprised, he hadn't been expected this. It was an unexpected match to be sure, though in times of war the militaristic Archduchy of Saxony will be a vital ally."

"Once you have met Archduchess Maria and signed the contract with his serene highness the Archduke, you and Maria will leave for Florentine where you will remain until it is safe to come home"

"Wha..." James started to protest, this set of alarm bells in his head. That the situation here was to dangerous for the heir of the throne to remain.

"James you must" Mary said, though stern she was clearly worried about him personally, "the heir to the throne must be safe, beyond the Duke de Lyon's reach. Don't worry about too much, this is only a precaution. With luck you will be able to return to Mercia very shortly"

"When am I to leave" James asked.

"Tomorrow morning" Mary said, "early"

"Yes your Majesty" James replied, bowing once more and retaking his seat.
1113211.title: At Court

11132111.content: Court had gone on for hours further the previous day, after that bombshell, and the following night James had barely slept a wink. Only to be awoken at 5 am and taken down to his carriage. He was given only a few minuets to say goodbye to his mother and brother until he climbed in and was whisked away into the night. The only familiar faces were his two pages, Lord Richard and Lord Harry. Other than that were the multitude of guardsmen, whom he could not really interact.
11132111.title: Following morning.

111321112.content:
The carriage took James from Rochester at top speed, he was travelling in convoy surrounded by guards and various retainers. While this allowed for great haste while in Mercia, when they were across the border foreigners would take particular note of a highly guarded civilian convoy, and that could cause trouble. Especially in such strained times.

For the time being James felt safe enough, though sat across from him looking nervous where his two pages, the Lords Richard and Harry of Balfour. They were told even less than James, and their presence here was only at James behest, or rather Queen Mary's on James' behalf. They had been sitting in silence for over an hour, just staring out the window "Are you two all right" James inquired.

"Your Highness" Harry quickly replied, "no.. I mean yes your highness. Thank you for asking"

James looked at the two young boys, their cautious smiles said more about their nerves than words did, "what were you told about this journey"

"That we were going to Saxony... and that we were to continue serving you, your highness" Richard replied this time.

"And we will your highness... loyally." Harry added.

"You were not told that we are to be at war?" James asked, this was his way of telling them. They would have to know at sometime, holding it from them wouldn't keep them any safer. Besides being told is far preferable to just overhearing, James guessed.

"War" Richard was visibly shocked, his older brother grabbed his hand and squeezed.

"We are going to Saxony to finalise an agreement that will prove important on the field of battle" James explained, "I'm sure everything will be just fine."

The young lords didn't look convinced, but James' words had been beneficial.

"Time for some breakfast, do you not think?" James asked, changing the subject.

With that the two finally smiled genuinely, James pulled a hamper out form beneath his seat placing it between them and opening it. It was filled with bread, cheese and pastries for their breakfast. Nothing particularly exciting, but very welcome after the last night sleep he had, as well as the journey in front of him. "Help yourself" Harry once again replied for both of them, he was very appreciative. Once James had taken a couple of slices of bread and cheese, Harry reached into the hamper and took something out for Richard and himself.

The three washed the breakfast down with a a cup of lemonade, and James pushed the hamper back under the seat. It was unsurprisingly far lighter now, James suspected that it was meant to do for more than one meal, but it was too late now. There were a few bits left, that would probably be eaten later, but the fresh bread and cheese was to nice to be left, thus they had eaten it all. James had eaten the most, Richard and Harry out of politeness for their better had shown a great degree of restraint in how much they eat, regardless of how hungry they were. James had encouraged them to eat more however, until they were full. As it was to be a long journey. Still, James had eaten a fair bit more than either of them. For Harry, the older of the two, this was unsurprisingly. He was very thin, thinner than James had ever been. Richard however was slightly pudgier than his older brother, and had almost certainly eaten more.
111321112.title: Eating breakfast on the journey.

choices: Meeting the Archduke and his daughter.
1113211121.content:
The royal convoy had reached Saxony faster than James had expected, the time spent travelling being less than a week. They had few stops to sleep, James his pages had slept when ever they wished in the royal carriage. The guards and retainers had taken in tern to sleep in the other carriages, and ride horse back. The only stops they made were to restock, and rest the horses.

Saxony was not what James had been expecting... though in truth he wasn't exactly sure what he'd been expecting. The climate was colder than even Mercia, the skys were grey and the countryside seemed very gloomy. He was impressed when they reached the capital Venenberg, it was a highly fortified city nested in the mountains. The sight of the military was all but omnipresent, what was presumably the royal palace was impressive, though it more resembled a castle than a palace. And not a particularly modern one.

The convoy drew into the palace and the great gates were opened for them where a guard of honour had formed seemingly to meet them.
1113211121.title: In Saxony.

11132111211.content:
"Your Serene Highness" the page said as he showed Prince James into the chamber of the Archduke of Saxonie, "may I present his Royal Highness Prince James, Crown Prince of Mercia. Your royal Highness, his Serene Highness Franz the third, Archduke of Saxonie"

James crooked his back in respect as he stepped into the Archduke's presence, as James came in the Archduke rose from his chair where he has been writing at his desk and bowed in respect to James.

"It's a pleasure to meet you, your Royal Highness." the Archduke said in a coarse and heavy accent.

"Likewise your Serene Highness" James reciprocated.

The Archduke lead James from his chambers down a corridor and a flight of stairs, awaking them in the room was a young women, adorned in what Saxonie might think was the finest clothes, but honestly looked rather drab when comparing with dresses worn by women back home... even some men. This was undoubtedly the Archduke's daughter.

"Prince James... may I present my daughter, and your betrothed. Archduchess Katherine." Franz said, as we went and stood beside his daughter."

"My Prince... I am honoured to meet you" the Archduchess curtseyed low before James.

"It's an honour to meet you too my Lady" James kissed her hand, as protocol back home demanded in such occasions.

1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
The Prince of Florentine had gathered all the leaders backing the House of York in the Palaces ornate throne room, there were loyalist Mercian nobles, envoys from Saxonie, various backers from the Florentine nobility, including the Prince himself, and perhaps most importantly the colonels and capitans of the mercenary companies that had been hired.

"His Royal highness the Prince James of Mercia" a herald announced as James entered the room. The eminent people gathered were sat at the long conference table where the Florentine government conversed with their Prince and one another. Prince Leonardo had left the seat at the head of the table for James, honourably not taking his usual seat on the throne behind up the dais, sitting to one side of James opposite Princess Isabella. Princess-Archduchess Katherine wasn't present, opting to remain at the estate with Prince Felix, as they prepared to move out.

"Thank you, my Lords and Ladies" James said, "the day it seems is here, colonels I gather my honourable friend the Duke of Ashbridge has agreed upon strategy with you"

The colonels and captains all nodded, General of the Royal Army the Duke of Ashbridge was Mercia's second highest ranking member of the armed forces after the Lord Admiral. He stood up to speak, bowing his read respectfully to James "yes your royal highness, captain Chevin and Hadrian will transport all 60,000 men, marine, cavalry and infantry to the Neck of Mercia, where they will land 20 miles north of the Aquitainei border, there we will take your ancestral home the fortress city of York, as we do so Queen Mary will move her army south and join up with the army of Saxonie as it crosses through Aqutaine. We will then make haste eastwards, as the Royal Navy launch seven simultaneous assaults at Aquitainei ports, including the capital Orléans, hopefully drawing enemy forces out of Rochester which we will then engage as Queen Mary leads her armies against Rochester, and it's remaining troops."

"A good strategy" James agreed, it was definitely sound. The power of the navy was not something that Aquitaine could match, uterlising them in a battle over land isn't always easy, but as a diversionary tactic it would actually allow them to capture several tactically useful port cities, though obviously not the capital it's self. Though he couldn't help wishing he could see the First Fleet at Orléans, bombarding it from the safety of the water, while all the locals could do is watch in fear of Mercia's magnificent navel might. At the very least it would bring the war home to them.

"We're also working on a number of Marcher noblemen to side with you against the Aquitainei, by closing their cities to them. Cash bribes and promises of honours such as new Lordships and knighthoods for their sons." Prince Leonardo said.

"And that would bring these marcher cities back under our Kingdom's jurisdiction"

"Right" the Duke of Ashbridge said, "for the first time since the Aquitainei took them from your grandfather."

The talk went on for another half-hour before they called the meeting to a close, the next time he saw many of these men would be on the beaches when they land in Mercia in a month or so's time. Until then, he was in for allot of travelling even before the fighting even started.

"Sorry my prince" Arthur said, "but we've been told we must leave immediately if we're to meet the General's projections.

"Right... guys" James replied, "you know I love you both, don't you"

"James" Arthur said soothingly, he took James hand. "I know, and I love you do"

Arthur hugged James, though not for as long as before as Joseph also felt he should to.

1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
Everything had gone to plan so far, it had taken over two month but they'd successfully landed in Mercia and pressed towards York and started the siege. It was sad to see the city occupied by collaborator lords who had decided to side with the Aquitainei, and a proud Mercian fortress city besieged by the forces of the Mercian royal family. With luck the men inside would surrender before too long, preventing a long drawn out siege.

James was at the front with his men, but wasn't required to fight due to the nature of the siege. He was in the royal tent receiving regular reports on the progress, which thankfully had resulted in few casualties thus far. The greatest moment thus far was when many of the local lords called their people up to join James' army bolstering it by almost 35,000. Once they had joined James' host, they were all sufficiently outfitted with uniform armour and weapons, thanks to the generous financing they'd received from Florentine, so gladly none would be sent into battle wearing rags, armed with little more than sticks like in the days best forgotten.

Arthur and Joseph were with James in his tent, it was raining heavily outside and it was humid making for a uncomfortable siege. Though James couldn't complain, for unlike most of the soldiers he was warm and dry, and their was no dominant expectation for him to join the battle. It was worth considering that most of the soldiers were not Mercian, but hired and professional solders, so he supposedly these conditions of war was something they were use to.

The locals had rallied to James, and their loyalty to him, Mary and the House of York was really heartening, but James truly wasn't a solider. He was good at charming and placating nobles, but fighting, killing and leading men into battle was certainly not something equip for. He'd never done it before, thanks to the past peace he'd never even been trained for it. What's more, he wasn't in the best physical condition to fight. He wasn't back when he was the skinny prince was forced to flee upon the impending invasion; and he certainly wasn't now given the amount of weight he'd gained while in exile. As for his companions, while Arthur did still 'look' to be fit, he too wasn't a fighter. And though still slender he had gained more than a few pounds of weight. Then of course was young Joseph. While his handsome face was still slender, the amount of fat the naturally stocky boy had gained in in his belly meant he too was totally unsuited for battle; though ironically his build would have made him the best fighter out of the three of them, if he was fitter that is.

Still the three of them were there, and would be armoured up if the situation called for it.

The siege had gone incredibly well, it had taken just a month for the nobles holding York to cave in and throw the city gates open to James' host. Since that triumph things went downhill fast. After leaving a garrison in York, James and his host raced eastwards to engage the Aquitainei forces once they were drawn out of the city. But the defeat of the Saxon army as they attempted to cross into Mercia was speedily followed up by the routing of Queen Mary's host, as the large Aquitainei army moved with haste engaging both armies separately to prevent them from combining their forces. As originally planned Royal Navy had successfully bombarded the seven Aquitainei ports before they were notified of the order to withdraw, fortunately allowing them time to regroup with minimal losses.

As a result of the two devastating defeats, James' host was also told to call off their planned engagement outside Rochester for fear that it would annihilated by overwhelming numbers if the occupying force in Rochester was able to join with the main Aquitainei army. As instructed James returned his host to York, and established court there. Weeks became months, and months became years as James sat in York, constantly waiting for news and instructions on where to go from there. The news came for ever slowly, but it seemed that Queen Mary had escaped back into the north with her forces and was actively recruiting extra more men while fighting a guerilla war against Aquitainei incursions. But even after two years he'd heard nothing of note from Saxonie, all that was provided was rumour and speculation... which was precisely what he had to ignore.

If there was one bright light, one light at the end of the tunnel, it was that James' forces at York were well supplied by the Navy. Nobody was starving, there was no decease. And even after almost two years the Aquitainei had not made any move to retake York. So James stayed positive, what else could he do? To admit defeat, to despair would break morale, and would play right into Aquitainei hands. They weren't out of the fight yet, Mary was still alive and he was still alive. Even if it took another ten years, he would not admit defeat.

James strode across his chamber to the drinks cabinet, and poured wine from a waiting bottle into two crystal glasses, he handed one to the duke and took the other with him as he sat down in the more comfortable settee placed carefully next to the fire. "continue, your grace"

"Thank you, my prince. As you know, on the standing orders of your sister, the Queen, the Admiral's fleet has been carrying out hit and run assaults along the Aquitainei coast. Today I received a telegram from his lordship informing him us that several recent assaults yielded some high value prisoners... hostages."

"Any names?" James asked eagerly.

"The Admiral would not say as much in the message, for fear of it falling into enemy hands, but assault severely damaged the Bastille island prison, which saw many prisoners escape. The Admiral's men rounded up as many as they could, before the Aquitaine navy it's self moved in themselves.

"What good are men who are already Aquitainei prisoners to us?" James wondered, he knew the question sounded naive and dismissive but honestly it wasn't what he meant.

"Wont King Charles know that we've got him... our navy assaulted the prison, it doesn't take a leap to assume that the admiral has captured him" James asked.

"That's true, though we predict that the Aquitainei are unlikely to think that we'd be 'foolish' enough to bring them here, the Admiral will send a decoy in the hope that they follow that as the prisoners are brought here" the duke continued.

They reached the wide corridor at the end of the stair case, at the end guarded by four guardsmen was a thick metal door. That chamber was where the Prince was being kept, in safety. James had never seen the South Tower apartments, but he had heard they were appropriate for high ranking prisoners, he hoped that the conditions were not to rough on the former King, who for all his country had done could not really be blamed for Mercia's plight.

"Open the door" James said to the doorman, who immediately complied. "Wait outside, and shut the door" James said to his guards as he stept into the chamber. Inside waiting for him was Prince Laurence, who had been dressed in an ill-fitting outfit that James had outgrown, Laurence was...
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: James is taken to meet the main prisoner.

choices: James decides to fatten him up...
James returns to inspect the other prisoners...
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
James walked cautiously through the antechamber into the uppermost apartment of the South Tower, historically reserved for only the most noble of prisoners it's current occupant was no exception. The apartments were grand and well decorated, though unable to leave the occupant can't feel that much like a prisoner here. His every need was catered for, and he was afforded servants at the cost of the Mercian kingdom's exchequer. James made his way through toward the innermost chamber which he imagined was the bed room, as expected the former King was inside sat on a chair beside the window reading a book.

"Prince Laurence?" James asked, he didn't know why he phrased it as a question it was obvious who it was.

"Yes" the boy rose from his chair and thrust himself onto his knees in front of James "Your Royal Highness"

"You may rise, we are of equal rank after all" James pointed out.

"It is appreciated" Laurence said in his thick Aquitainei accent.

The man that stood before James was not what he was expecting, he was child-like in appearance, James would have guessed he was 17 or 18 rather than 24. He was a few inches taller than James and also very thin, almost gaunt, it was unsurprising that the clothes he wore hung on him. Despite this he appeared to be quite attractive, a trait that would likely be far more evident if he wasn't so thin. James couldn't help feeling sorry for the poor, weak and scared prince that stood before him.

"You are Prince James, am I right?" Laurence asked timidly."Queen Mary's brother?"

"I am indeed" James answered.

"I am truly sorry for what has happened to you" Laurence said, by his tone James knew that he was genuine, "but you must know that I had nothing to do with it, my cousin attacked Mercia without my permission and used his success to oust me from the throne"

"Not before you appointed him King of Mercia" James shot back.

"My cousin took a position I was unable to deny him" Laurence explained, "as soon as he had his soldiers came to Orléans, which was when my privy council forced me from the throne and declared him King. Not content with my abdication he imprisoned me in the Bastile"

"I know" James softened, he was having a difficult time being angry with the shy prince, "don't concern yourself, we know your not to blame. You don't think we'd be treating you like this if we did blame you in anyway"

"You don't?" He replied.

"I shouldn't lie though, I have no control over your ultimate fate - Queen Mary will decide then. Until that time I mean to treat you as an honoured guest" James said kindly.

"Th...thank you" Prince Laurence said nervously, "truly I am unworthy of such mercy..."

"We aren't vindictive, I don't intend to treat you badly for the crimes of others simply because they are your relation" James said, and made his way toward the door to leave.

"Will I see you again your... er." Laurance cut himself off before he could finish the sentence.

"I should think so" James said non-committally, truly he intended to - he found the guy really sweet, and really had an urge to help him, despite what his vindictive senses were telling him.
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: Skinny... the clothes were too big for him.

choices: After dinner James get's changed for bed...
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
After leaving the Prince Laurence the first and only thing on James' mind was how thin he was, so much so he almost looked gaunt. The clothes given to him were those that had belonged to James before he outgrew them, and they just hang on him. The trousers looked as if they were going to fall down. James didn't know if this was his natural body type or as a result of a month spent in prison, perhaps a bit of both. Either way he was determined not to allow it to continue.

"Make sure he's provided with plenty of food" James said to the gaoler, "he looks positively starved"

"I will you're highness"
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: James decides to fatten him up...

1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
As soon as James rose the following morning and was dressed he returned to the North Tower to visit his newest and most important prisoner. Like the previous visit James took a full squad Royal Guardsmen with him, seemingly only there to lead the way... In a fortress full of loyal troops it always felt unfair to James that he must always be accompanied by Guardsmen, though if the loyalty of a troop was tested that would be the time his guard was required. Here though, visiting such a frail prisoner, James was in no danger. Even if the worse did come to the worse, he had his ceremonial sword and dagger.

"Your Royal Highness" the doorman said to James as he came into view.

James smiled at the doorman who started opening the door without being asked, "Thank you, sir." James said polity, he turned to his guards and raised his hand, signalling that they should again wait outside. After James stepped into the antechamber the door clanked shut behind him, he preceded into the private apartments where he expected the young prince Laurence to be waiting for him.
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: James returns the following morning...

1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
James left the anti chamber, and headed down a corridor that lead him to the private apartments that Prince Laurence was aloud to use while imprisoned in York. Unlike a common prisoners all of Laurence's needs and comforts were all provided for, as well as a spacious bed chamber and the anti chamber, where he was suppose to greet his guests, the apartments included a modest dining hall and a small library. All we richly decorated with the finest portraits, tapestries, curtains and carpets, as so forth, as well as furnishings one would expect any Lord or Prince to possess. If nothing else the former King couldn't complain about his conditions.

To James' embarrassment he entered the bed chamber he caught Laurence halfway through dressing, "Oh gods, sorry"

"No, it's my fault" Laurence croaked self consciously, he had clearly not been out of bed for long, though luckily for him he had just pulled on his underwear when James observed him, though that was it.

Looking at Laurence's nude body, James couldn't believe just how thin he was. True he'd noticed how gaunt the prince was looking when they'd first met, but looking upon his bare torso, he was so lacking in both muscle and fat that his ribs could be seen. When he did pull up his trousers, they fell down with him having to hold them up there after.

"Sorry your highness" Laurence said, when he briefly let go of the trousers to bow they once again fell to his feet, "I should have been ready and dressed for your visit"

"Don't worry about it, I should have announced my visit" James replied, though James' had so wanted to be angry with Laurence, the timid yet polite attitude and manners of the prince once again stopped him, softening him.
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: Laurence was dressing.

1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
James sat down on an arm chair placed at the end of the bed, facing where Laurence stood dressing. He'd previously asked the gaoler to assure that Laurence was well provided with food, though that would obviously take some time before any changes were visible. James couldn't help wondering whether Laurence was naturally this thin, he'd always heard that he was skinny... but he'd never imagined this much. The question mark regarding ill treatment, such as starving him, was that he wasn't beaten and brused, treatment one might expect if someone was too deprived of food.

"Prince Laurence" James started, "you're so skinny... thin. Is this natural, how you've always been... or were you starved in your previous prison"

Laurence managed to pull a shirt over his frail torso and keep his trousers up, before they could fall down again he sat down on the armchair positioned adjacent to that James was sat in.

"I have always been thin sir, but not always this much so. Although I wasn't deprived of food in the Basile, the quality of the food was better suited to dogs. Even the bread was lined with sawdust! I ate just enough to survive" Laurence explained. "I apologise again that you had to see me like this"

"My fault I insist... besides we royalty have to use to others seeing us without clothes" James replied, he shot Laurence a friendly smile, "I do hope your being better fead here"

"Yes indeed" Laurence quickly replied, "the door provided so far reminded me when I was at court. I had no idea that Mercian food was so good!"

"Great" James replied, "with luck you will be return to a healthier weight very soon"

"Thank you for arranging it... and these apartments. Though the food is tasty, I am not use to eating that much so I apologise for sending so much back uneaten"

"You must stop apologising" James insisted. "Just make sure you eat. Let nobody think that we're ill treating you... and of course, I don't like to think of you being so frail and unhealthy."
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: James mentions his thinness.

choices: Laurence hadn't put on any weight.
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
When a meeting was called at lunch to discuss the war, James had hoped that more had changed since a full council had been called. But over the 12 course meal, no new facts were brought to light. Queen Mary still hadn't been heard of, and though the Archduke of Saxony professed that he was okay, and had one several minor battles against the Aquitainee the forces at York were still in no position to do anything.

As speculated, the Aquitaine had decided not to siege York, and though they were preventing access to most of the country plenty of supply lines were active with the sea meaning the city was still well supplied. Clearly the new King wasn't going to let his ego let him waste forces on trying to break an impenetrable city, he surely knew that locked up in the city along the western coast they could do no harm, thus could be dealt with later. James left the meeting feeling slightly dejected, thankfully nothing bad had taken place since last council was called, but he had hoped for some good news that might change everything.

He left the dining hall and was fast joined by his Royal Guardsmen who took up position behind him, James could at least see how his favourite prisoner was doing. As he climbed the last flight of winding stairs in the North Tower his stomach began feeling tight with indigestion. As was often the case at such feasts, James had greedily eaten allot, and now he was being punished for it. The corset he wore was uncomfortable at the best of times, with such a bloated stomach the tightness was nearly unbearable.

Upon reaching the final floor where the apartments of Prince Laurence were, James was breathing heavily. With relief he brushed the beads of sweat from his brow and entered the anti chamber, as always leaving his guards to protect the only entrance and exit. Thankfully Laurence wasn't awaiting him in the antechamber, so he was able to wait and regain his breath for a few moments before going in and seeing the former Aquitainee King.
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: A month later.

1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
Once James had caught his breath he let himself into the bed chamber where Laurence was sitting reading a book in front of the fire. It had been about a week since James had last looked in on Laurence, and he was glad to see the handsome young man again.

"Good to see you again, your highness" Laurence said to James, he singled at James offering the seat besides him. "Besides the servants, you're the only person who I get to see"

"Really? I could arrange for some of the other Aqutainee prisoners to be brought in?" James asked, he sat down on the armchair beside Laurence's, the strain of his stomach on the corset almost hurt, he could almost feel the flab protruding from bellow.

"No thanks... I don't know any of them much anyway. Seeing you is enough" Laurence said, he smiled nervously as James'

"Im glad." James replied, "If I'd known I would have come to visit you more... It's really nice talking to a fellow prince"

Laurence blushed, "same to you"

James noticed that Laurence was filling out, just looking at his face and arms it was obvious that he was far less skinny than when he'd first arrived. James couldn't help wondering how much he'd put on in the past month.
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: Laurence had put on weight.

1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
"Your looking much better than when you first got here" James commented.

"I'm feeling much better and healthier" Laurence said, "I must thank you again for the decent food that you're providing me with. I'm no longer sending as much back as when I first arrived... It's so nice to have decent food once again"

"No problem, we could hardly feed you on the same rubbish as your previous prison" James replied.

Laurence lifted his shirt to show his stomach, although it was still slim his ribs were no longer visible and he was even sporting a small but noticeable fold of belly flab. James could see by Laurence poking his stomach just how much softer it was looking. "I've already started to put on some weight"

"I can see..." James nodded in acknowledgement, "It's great to see you looking less skinny"

"Thanks, I appreciate it" Laurence, "Even after just a month I think i'm no longer as skinny as I was even at court in Aquitaine."

"If you'd like I could arrange for some gym equipment be sent up, dumbbells and so forth, if you'd like to work on your abdominal muscles and strength too. I imagine that it can get pretty boring up here" James offered, though the offer was sincere he had doubts that a boy so thin as Laurence could do much with them.

"You could arrange that?" Laurence asked, as he pondered the offer.

"I could if you so wish"

"I suppose that it's the sort of thing you do in your free time"

"Not as much as I'd like" James responded honestly, he knew that it was true that he should probably use the gymnasium more in his free time, 'I'm fit enough, it's not that necessary for me', James thought to himself. "I don't get as much time as I'd like... It doesn't mean you shouldn't."
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: Well over a stone.

1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
"It can't hurt... it would be nice not to be stick thin" Laurence said enthusiastically, "not being able to do any exercise can't be good for my body... eating as I have this month. Princes like us can't afford to get fat."

"Neither can kings... should you ever regain your throne." James agreed, he chuckled and grinned at Laurence. He was right, as James knew. Princes, and of course kings, couldn't afford to get fat on their decadence, especially if they're prisoners, be it the literal kind of Laurence or James' illiteral kind. James knew of course that he wasn't the lithe boy he'd been when he was forced to flee court, he had admittedly put on a bit of weight... fat. Especially around his stomach. But he knew it wasn't that bad, he was still fit... it wouldn't be much of an effort to lose the belly.

"Haha... good point. Prince or king" James said, "though I can hardly imagine you getting fat"

"Nor can I you" Laurence replied, his tone sounded genuine.

"I probably have a few pounds of fat on my stomach that I could stand to lose" James admitted.

Though not aware that James was wearing a corset, Laurence could see by looking at James that he appeared to be perfectly slender, okay maybe not slim, but average. Definitely not fat. "Most of the weight I've gained is probably fat, I can't imagine much is muscle" Laurence pointed out, and the weight he'd gained almost certainly numbered over a stone.

James smiled, "but you're still skinny"

"I won't be for much longer... hopefully in time, I'll be more muscular" Laurence patted his stomach.

"Good luck with it" James said, "I'll have the equipment brought up later this afternoon"
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: Laurence takes up the offer.

choices: Allot, his abs looked well defined.
Little, he had injured himself working out.
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
Another month past, and though James had wished for to be as uneventful as the previous, for nothing more than no news being better than bad news, quite the reverse was true. News had poured in from the north and the east, and most fortunately most of it was good. Queen Mary and the Archduke of Saxony had both won major battles in the field, and drawn King Charles into joining the war personally. Which meant that soon the forces at York would be called to join with Mary's at the north, for a push to regain the capital. What's more, if the Archduke defeated King Charles in the field, then without heirs his regime would collapse, with luck the joint forces of Mercia and Saxony could take the Aquitainee capital, perhaps place Laurence back on the throne... and expand both of their realms at the expense of Aquitaine.

The busyness of the month meant that James hadn't been able to visit Prince Laurence very often, though hopefully he wouldn't mind too much if it meant that he would soon be released from his gilded cell. Now that a course of action had been decided on, there was very little for James to do until the forces left York.

The Duke of Ashbridge had taken charge of the forces, and was readying to them for battle, he'd actually recommended James himself get some training in, sparing, wrestling... anything to get in shape for the coming battles, given that he'd have some free time. James certainly wasn't keen, he didn't love physical training, and he certainly wasn't looking forward to the possibility of going into battle.

James hadn't dismissed it out of hand, he kept telling his pages that they'd also go and get some sparing in, but like him they were more than happy to put it off. Instead James had decided to make a long awaited visit to Prince Laurence, who ironically last he'd heard was working out with the equipment James had had sent up.

"I may be in a while, if i'm not out before lunch could you have it brought up along with the prisoner's" James said to the gaoler standing next to the cell door.

"As you command your highness"

James let himself into the antechamber, the large space had evidently been where Laurence had decided to put the gymnasium equipment. Not the best room perhaps, but it does the job. James made his way trough the room carefully avoiding tripping over a dumbbell that had been left close to the corridor. James guessed that Laurence was in his bed chamber, which he tended to use as a living space. Not surprising, it was certainly the nicest room in the tower. Placing his hand on the door handle, James couldn't help wondering how much working out Laurence had done.
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: Another month or so later.

choices: He was right, although he had gained a few pounds (mostly fat, some muscle).
He was wrong, he'd put on over a stone more (mostly fat, barely any muscle).
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
"Sorry I haven't visited you in a while" James said upon entering Lawrence's bed chamber. Laurence was sat reading a book beside the window, it didn't look as if he'd done much working out, though obviously looks could be deceiving. Not having much arm definition did not mean his chest wasn't toned.

"Ah, Prince James" Laurence said with a hint of joy in his voice, he rose from his seat for a moment until James took the one beside him, "Don't apologise, I am lucky that you visit me at all. Most captors wouldn't"

"Things have been really busy, and hopefully before long we'll be ready to leave York" James explained.

"Leaving York? It's only been months, yet it almost seems like years. Am I to leave also? Or will I be left here?" Laurence wondered.

"That hasn't yet been decided, If we do well in the on coming battles then I see no reason why you wont be brought with us. If we do badly, then you'll probably be safer here" James said candidly.

"Makes sense"

"I noticed you've used the hallway for your gymnasium equipment" James said, he'd been wondering how to broach the subject.

"Yeah, I hope that's okay? They wanted to put it in here, but the rooms already full enough... the anti chamber wasn't doing anything" Laurence said, he was very apologetic. Too apologetic.

"No, no it's fine." James smiled, he patted Laurence on his hand comfortingly, "I was only wondering. So have you been using the equipment much"

"I haven't I'm afraid" Laurence said, there was no point lying, "The first couple of days I used it quite allot, but I sprained a tendon and hurts too much to use.... I'm sorry"

"Don't start apologising again" James chuckled, "It's not your fault"

"Thanks" Laurence said smiling, at the handsome prince sitting beside him. "So my body hasn't really changed that much since last month."
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: Little, he had injured himself working out.

choices: James says he looked like he's gained more.
James lies, and agrees that he's gained nothing more.
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
"A shame, but I guess it can't be helped" James replied.

"It would have been if I could have gotten fit before you moved me on... I've always been really skinny, so I guess it's not a shock" Laurence chuckled.

James was pleased that Laurence wasn't too hung up on it, he sounded quite disappointed when he'd first broached the subject. It was a good point about always being skinny, even James had heard of the frailty of the Aquitainei king, though he'd always know it was an unfair exaggeration, there was no doubt that Laurence was naturally thin, thus probably found it difficult to build muscle mass. Not that he'd progressed far in the first place. "So no change at all on last month?" James asked, "You did say you did a couple of days before you injured yourself"

"No change" Laurence said firmly, "I've eaten properly of course, but really there's been no change to my body since last month."

"How much do you imagine you weigh" James asked, "if you don't mind me asking."

"No not at all, somebody at the Bastile remarked that I barely weighed 8 stone... the first month or so here I think I must have reached my average weight once again, nine stone, nine and a half perhaps."

"Gaining over a stone in your first month in the North Tower and getting back to your average weight is good... I'm glad you were able to reach a healthy weight so fast"

"I appreciate it" Laurence said, thanking James yet again.

"So you've not gained anything since?" James wondered, looking at him it didn't look as if he had. "One or two pounds perhaps, nothing noticeable."

"I don't think so no, a pound or two perhaps at the very most... if you don't mind?" Laurence looked at James indicating that he lift his shirt and show James.

"Not at all" James replied, Laurence clearly didn't know much about James if he asked if he minded seeing a handsome boy's body.

Instead of lifting his shirt up, he pulled it off completely and placed it beside him. Although he'd said he thought his body hadn't changed at all in the past month, apart from a pound or two at the most, his body told a different story. Behind the cover of a shirt, he looked just as slender as the previous month. Without it, James could see that he'd gained far more than a few pounds over his second month. The small fold of flab James had spied previously was now far larger, in fact his entire stomach was soft and flabby, bulging slightly over his waist into his lap. And his belly button! James had observed when he'd first seen Laurence's bare body, that he had a fairly large and deep belly button, despite being so skinny. And again he'd seen the previous month, when Laurence had filled out a bit. With a good stone more weight (James guessed) the size of the belly button really made him look pudgy.
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: He was wrong, he'd put on over a stone more...

choices: They spar a couple of days later.
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
Lawrence still had a lithe physique, his arms and legs were really skinny, as was his torso. Even with his shirt on he appears every bit as skinny as James had always imagined he was. The reality was only evident when looking upon his naked upper body, for two months of little exercise and as much fattening food as he desires had given him a soft sizeable paunch upon his thin frame. It wasn't that surprising that he was seemingly oblivious to it, James too wasn't sure if he should contradict the prince, or lie and agree that he'd gained nothing.

"I always hated being so skinny, I would have liked to have been able to tone my body" Laurence put one of his hands on his stomach, inadvertently making it jiggle ever so slightly. "even If I did gain a pound or two then it's probably fat rather than muscle"

"If you did gain a pound or two it may have been a muscle, if it was only a day or so's work" James fibbed, "I know what you mean about hating being skinny. I always hated being skinny... and I was never as skinny as you wer... are"

Laurence looked at James' body, he was richly dressed in several layers but the shape of his body, disguised by the corset was still visible to him. James didn't look that thin, his torso looked to be perhaps slightly stocky, suggesting he might be quite muscled. "You don't look too skinny" Laurence said, "well your arms still looks quite thin, but your body looks like it might be quite muscly". He paused suddenly, "I'm sorry... I didn't mean to be personal"

"Be as personal as you want" he said in a flirt, smiling coyly at Laurence.

Laurence was unsure how to respond to James's slightly alluring remark, instead of saying anything he just smiled shyly back at James.

After a few moments of awkwardly smiling at one another, James decided to respond to his observation, "I'm not particularly muscly either... I probably have a few extra pounds of fat that I should lose"

"You look fine to me" Laurence replied.

"Your kind to say" he was probably fibbing a bit, James knew he could probably stand to lose a few pounds, but it was definitely nothing that a bit of exercise wouldn't fix. He's not that unfit. "The Duke of Ashbridge has actually urged me to get in shape for the coming conflict, fencing, wrestling, weight lifting and so forth."

"Oh right, how much have you done so far?"

"I haven't actually started yet... actually, do you fence, or wrestle?" James asked.

"I've done a bit of fencing... I'm not particularly good"

"Neither am I, perhaps we could spar together at some time?"

"Oh that would be interesting, I'd love to" Laurence's face lit up, "Far better than a workout on my own"
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: James lies, and agrees that not gained...

1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
James had put off exercise since the Duke had first suggested he get in shape, he even saw himself put if off a couple of days after agreeing to do so with Laurence. He'd still gone and visited the cutie, but had passed on sparing with him on both occasions. Laurence hadn't seemed disappointed, he was appreciative to just have James' company. But after some nudging from Joseph and Arthur, jokingly taunting again about him being 'fat', James had agreed to some exercise, and was starting with some sparring with Laurence. He knew that Joe and Arthur were probably joking, but he would have to lose some weight before he could go into battle. Wearing the corset was never that necessary, but at least it does hide the belly fat i do have, he'd tell himself.

Laurence was there waiting for James when he entered the antechamber, the workout equipment had been cleared to either side and capped swords had been brought up with James, they obviously couldn't be left with Laurence. It had taken enough persuasion to keep the Royal Guardsman out of the room.

James chucked Laurence a sword, which he caught awkwardly in both arms. "Cheers"

"Looking good" James complemented Laurence's white outfit done up at the waste with a red belt, he'd kind of wished that Laurence would spar with him without his shirt on, not a sensible wish perhaps if they were duelling. But there was still time.

James himself was wearing a considerably more extravagant outfit, though like Laurence's it was loosely fit. And though Arthur had instead that he should wear a corset again, it was on allot looser - which meant he felt allot more comfortable than usual. It was necessary for working out after all.

"You too" Laurence returned the complement.

As they circled each other readying to start sparing against one another, James considered his strategy. They were about the same height, well Laurence may be a few inch or so taller, but James knew he was heavier, and probably stronger. And though he didn't think himself too fat, he knew he wasn't at all fit. He didn't bet that Laurence was either, he was stick thin and had a flabby belly. Still, he was probably marginally faster, that and he's smaller. "Let's go"
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: They spar a couple of days later.

choices: James asks Laurence to remove his shirt.
Laurence asks to see James' body.
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.content:
So far James had managed to beat Laurence once, decisively, and Laurence beat him by duelling him to a standstill. After about twenty minuets, he was starting to feel pretty tired. But so too was Laurence, who he could see was sweating. But James was determined to win this match, and judging by their now slowing moves that would require one to tire before the other.

It wasn't long before a final move was struck, James had parried against a heavy strike from Laurence who was now breathing very heavily. "I yield' he said, taking a long breath between both words.

"Finally!" James said, he too was breathing heavily, "I was on the verge of yielding myself"

"I haven't done quite so much exercice in years" Laurence joked, "even if we've barely done half an hour"

"Not been quite as long for me, but I know what you mean"

"Would you like a drink?" Laurence asked, the servants brought some up to my bed chamber just last night. Not sure what but there must be something refreshing.

"That sounds great" James said, he brushed his hair from his face. The two walked through to Laurence bed chamber, and while Laurence fixed them both a drink James perched on the chaise longue.

"Here you go" Laurence said passing him a drink, "It's just juice i'm afraid. The servants didn't bring up anything particularly exciting"

"Juice is great thanks" James replied, he patted the chaise longue and Laurence sat down beside him. "A few more hundred hours of that and we might have built up some muscle mass!"

"A few more hundred hours?" Laurence chuckled at the idea, he removed his belt and dropped it to the floor, loosening his white shirt.
1113211121122111121112211111222211112112.title: Laurence tires first.

choices: Laurence asks to see James' body.

" Lucas, " George said with a little stern in his voice. " Well... you have become a little zaftig sir." Lucas said. " Poo." George said as he stamps his foot on the ground. Lucas notices a small shock wave from the stomp jiggling up his thigh to his bubble butt.

As george walks over to the window there is a slight bounce to his belly and his bubble but jiggles and wiggles after every step. " Lucas, i need to go on a diet. " "Yes sir and when do you want to begin this diet." " Tomorrow, right now im hungry, can you bring meeeee.... two burgers, large fries and a milk shake," George ask as he rubs his soft belly.

with a smile Lucas replied. " Yes sir." George had been doing this for a long time, every day him and lucas go through the same thing. Lucas pats george on his soft gut making it quiver and he left the room....

1221.content:
It wasn't long before Lucas returned with his master's request, however, George had begun to grow impatient. When Lucas entered the room carrying the platter, George said, "Finally! Thank you Lucas, but can you please leave this tray here and bring another plate with the same thing? Thank you!" He waved Lucas out of the room and sat down to begin his meal. He tore away at his first burger and shoveled in most of his fries before Lucas returned with the second platter. Lucas set it down, and watched in awe as George devoured everything hungrily. In his haste, George ignored some of his royal etiquette, and made a bit of a mess. Sitting in only his undergarments, he had grease from his burgers dripping down his rounded, pudgy belly. Gorging himself on two full meals came at slight consequence, as Lucas could see his highness visibly bloating right before his eyes.
         George finished his meal before the size of it all really registered in his mind, and he began feeling the true fullness of it all. He closed his eyes and let out a sigh, before placing both hands on his belly and massaging it. After a few small burps, Lucas quietly spoke, "Sir...you wouldn't want to be late to fencing class."
         "Oh...Yes...Thank you Lucas. Would you mind running a bath for me quickly? It looks like I made a mess of myself," George replied, gesturing at the greasy marks on his belly and the stains on his white underpants.
         "Of course, sir. Right away!" and with that, Lucas rushed into the bathroom to begin filling the prince's extravagant bath. He guided George over to the tub, where George held his arms away from his body and his pelvis slightly directed towards his servant. Taking the hint, Lucas began to remove the stained garment from George's bloated body, and put it in the clothes basket to be washed. George lowered himself into the bath and began rubbing soapy water all over his body.
1221.title: George Pigs Out

12211.content:
After finishing his bath, George had Lucas help him into his fencing uniform, as he could not do up the back on his own. After a few moments of Lucas struggling, George said, "is there something wrong?"

Then get someone in to tailor me a new suit properly, since the last seamstress was clearly a right mess." George ordered, and Lucas turned to walk out the door. George stopped him and called, "Well help me out of this first!"

         Lucas paused right outside his master's quarters and leaned against the wall to gasp for air. He had a hard enough time as is to not show his attraction to George, but his slowly swelling stomach is doing things to Lucas that he doesn't quite understand.
