"I know. I know" Ferdinand said, brushing his hand across Jose's shoulder, before turning back to Carlos. "Let me borrow that outfit again. The one you gave me when..."

"Yes. I know which one" he replied, retreating calmly into the closet to retrieve the rich, if plain and austere looking outfit he had dressed his hungover friend in on that previous occasion. It only took him a few minuets to retrieve the basic garments; returning to the main bed chamber to find Ferdinand stripped down to his underwear, and leaning on the edge of his bed. "Here."
1412.title: Sneak into town.

choices: He just about gets them on.
14121.content:
"Thanks" he said, jumping to his feet with a bounce to take garments Carlos held aloft for him. Tossing the fine white silk shirt on to the bed, he dropped the dark blue trousers to the floor, and slipped each foot and leg into them. That intimidate rub against his skin was... nice, gentle. Just serving to remind Ferdinand that some of the more elaborate clothing he was expected to wear at court were also blood uncomfortable.

That moment of ease and comfort ended swiftly, however, when he pulled the trousers onto his waist, and attempted to fasten them. Failing to do so on his first try, he breathed in as much as he could as he attempted a second, this time managing to touch each side together, but ultimately failing to fasten before he had to breath out. "Carlos, are you sure these are the trousers you lent me before?"

"Certain yes"

"Not Jose's" he wondered, remembering that Jose had a slightly thinner waist than he and Carlos.

"No, they're not mine" Jose interjected.

"They've always been a bit... snug" Carlos admitted, "but no more so than that."

With a nod Ferdinand pulled the trousers up once more and breathed in deeply, rapidly pulling the waist band once again to fasten.
14121.title: Trousers are too tight.

145.content:
Name and title: Ferdinand, Prince of Castile
Age: 11
Complexion: Olive tan
Hair: Curly dark brown
Height: 5’1”
Weight: 7.1 stone ---- 99 lbs
Body type:Slender - athletic
Description: Ferdinand of Castile is the second in line to the throne of Castile. He is an active, confidant and flamboyant boy, much the contrast to his straight laced father and arrogant cousins.
145.title: When Ferdinant, Carlos and Jose first met.

choices: Had lost all the weight, and toned up.
1453.content:
Today was the first day of summer, well officially according to the calender atleast; it had been scorching for weeks now. Right across the coast the commoners of Castile filled the beaches, here in Royal Palace at Jecca almost everything took place in the gardens of Royal Palace, court, parties, nobles pleasure time.

Ferdinand couldn't help feeling slightly sorry for the women; they still wore their enormous and extravagant dresses, though summer-dress was made of lighter fabrics, there were no allowances made for their comfort. As in the other two great Kingdoms to the north, women had to dress respectfully. Men on the other hand were able to wear as little - with the exception of underpants - as they wanted, obviously their was a dress code at important court functions. Ferdinand had noticed that this dress-freedom, widely known as the summer liberty, was really only embraced by the young, presumably due to most nobleman wishing to always to dress to impress.

The summer liberty meant the almost inclusive and carefully observed tradition of fasting was required, which young men and boys followed in the three months preceding the summer. This because of the widespread feasting that happened thorough out the winter season. For some this tradition of fasting was more difficult and strict than for others, it usually depended on just how much was eaten during the winter season. It was seen to be important that young men looked healthy and fit, especially if they dressed liberally in summer. This covered young boys as well, Ferdinand had followed this tradition for 4 years now, ever since he was 7, despite the fact that he hadn't really dressed that casually until he was 9. As with last year, he would wear only his underwear for most of the summer season. The fasting tradition was more important for him this year as he had eaten far more in the previous winter than the one last year, which had resulted in him gaining over 8 pounds, double last year's.

Ferdinand remembered how displeased his governess had been, at the time he hadn't cared. That winter had been fantastic, just relaxing and almost gorging himself on the massive variety of delicious foods. Though he had felt displeasure and slight embarrassed at the fact that Jose and Carlos had only gained only 5 pounds between them throughout feast season.
1453.title: Beginning of summer.

14532.content:
Unfortunately, despite his strict fasting discipline and exercise regime Ferdinand had only managed to drop half the weight he had gained in the winter. Though it mattered not, 4 pounds was better than nothing, and with or without loosing the rest he was still slender. He stepped into the gardens and spied Carlos and Jose, they both approached him and bowed respectfully.

"Your highness" They said in unison. Before they group hugged. The three all were taking full example of the summer liberty, whilst Carlos and Jose both wore cream underwear that went as far as their knees, Ferdinand's went down only a few inches. "Talk about liberal" Carlos said, noting just how short his underwear was.

"Your both looking good" Jose said to Carlos and Ferdinand "I take it the fast was a success" he said asking them about their successes, whilst Ferdinand had gained eight pounds Carlos had only gained 3, and Jose only 2.

"Yeah it was indeed. I'm back down to 95 pounds" Carlos replied.

"Not quite as good... I'm down to 103" , Ferdinand said prodding his own stomach.

"That's?" Jose asked.

"Four pounds... still 'had' another 4 to go" Ferdinand said smiling checkaly.

"It shows chubs" Carlos teased, prodding Ferdinands slightly soft stomach.

"Had? You're not planning on loosing the rest of it?" Jose asked.
14532.title: Had only lost half the weight.

145321.content:
"Hell no" Ferdinand replied. "Do you know how tough it is fasting?!"

"Yes" Jose and Carlos replied together.

"Ha! You skinny bastards don't know what actually 'having' to fast is like" Ferdinand retorted.

"You were skinny too before the winter" Carlos pointed out.

"You're still skinny now" Jose added.

"Not like you skeletons" he joked. They were being honest, because although Ferdinand was a good few pounds heavier than both of them he was still skinny, or slim at least. He did still have a small but noticeable layer of flab on his stomach, that neither of them had.

"You didn't loose all your weight last for summer either." Jose teased. That was also true, before last winter he had weighed only 92 pounds and over the feasting season gained 4 pounds, and then lost only a pound for summer season. It was a thought, he'd never really lost that much of the extra weight he gained in winter, despite his 'best' efforts.

"Currently seven pounds of unlost feast weight" Ferdinand acknowledged tapping his stomach.

"If you lost that 7 pounds you'd weigh the same as me again" Carlos added, both he Ferdinand and Jose were all roughly the same height and had the same slight build, there was only a pounds difference in Carlos and Jose's weight, and with exception to the fat Ferdinand's stomach was carrying they all appeared to be about the same size. They weren't that surprised that Ferdinand didn't care, he was always extremely laid back, fortunately he wasn't lazy or the weight would do incredible damage.

"I suppose it's just fortunate that you can carry it off" Carlos conceded, he put of of his arm around Ferdinand and used the other to tap his stomach.
145321.title: Hell no!

1453211.content:
"Let's go to lunch" Ferdinand suggested. The three boys walked a short distance to a lush green area over looking the lake. Efficiently Royal service meant that a wide assortment of lunch was delivered to them in a relatively short amount of time, despite there chosen location.

Either Ferdinand had over ordered or this was just a standard amount, around about 5 servants brought an assortment of breads, meats, pastries, cakes to their 'picnic' spot, an amount far more than 3 young boys could eat. "Looks great, I'm starved" Jose said.

It was more than they could all finish, but not that much. They had gotten a fair way through the breads and meats and almost completely finished the cakes and pastries, before a servant came and cleared everything away. The three boys, their stomach's bloated, just lay next to each other in the summers heat as they let the food go down.

"We ate far too much" someone at least spoke, it was Jose. He stroked his still bloated belly, he looked more bloated than ever Ferdinand, who was laying to the left of him on onside cuddled into Carlos, they both looked asleep, or at least very drowsy. Carlos looked just as bloated as Jose did, to his slight relief. Jose didn't feel left out, he was glad not to cuddled in this heat, he suspected that elders at court not approve at the closeness of two guys anyway. Though he wasn't going to say anything or wake them up.
1453211.title: Lunch time

14532111.content:
Jose hadn't expected the week to go down like this, though the intense heat gave them little other choice of what to do. They had spend most of the week relaxing in the heat, sleeping, tanning and perhaps a little too much time eating. Jose remembered on the first day of summer them having a chat about there bodies, Carlos had teased Ferdinand a little bit about being slightly chubby, and Ferdinand had teased Carlos and Jose for being so skinny. Since that day they had all shared enormous lunches together everyday, the portions were far to big for boys there age. Though most days they didn't have breakfast or dinner together, the massive lunch and the assortment of snacks throughout the day was enough. Jose had gained a pound, in a week. He wasn't sure about Carlos and Ferdinand, but they must have gained something too. Especially by his recollection he himself had eaten the least amount of food of the three.

Jose could barely believe it, after all the hard work of the fasting season, plus he'd only gained 2 pounds in the whole of the feasting season. Obviously he didn't expect Ferdinand to care that much, but he was slightly surprised about Carlos. The three were again just in their short trousers lounging in front of the lake. Jose looked at Carlos and Ferdinand's bare stomach and wondered if they had gained any weight, like Jose, Carlos still looked very skinny, and perhaps even a bit toned. Ferdinand on the other hand, whilst looking slender had a definite layer of flab on his stomach. Though he had had that before, hadn't he?

About 45 minuets later after another large lunch, as they sat leant against a tree as their bloated stomachs went down Jose wondered again if he should broach the subject with Carlos and Ferdinand. It had crossed his mind that it might only be him who was gaining the weight, after all he was the lightest and the thinnest. Did he really want to highlight his own gain if they hadn't gained anything.
14532111.title: Later that week...

145321112.content:
Jose almost began asking them, but bit hit tongue to stop himself. It was only a pound, and he really didn't want to highlight the fact that he had gained anything to them, if they hadn't. He could see Carlos leaning forward, unlike Ferdinand and Jose he had no flab hanging over to speak of, it was odd considering Jose weighed no more, in fact he most likely weighed less than Carlos, that when he leant forward he could feel a tiny amount of belly fat hang over his own waist. Perhaps Carlos and Ferdinand were exercising more than Jose was, that thought made him instantly feel bad, and in need of exercise.

They had eaten a fair bit last summer, and other than expected weight with growing up, Jose hadn't gained anything. It was far less humid last year though, and there was a nice cool breeze so the amount of exercise they had done was far more. Hopefully this would be the case going on in the summer, it couldn't stay this hot for that much longer. The boys of Castile could and must be better than the nancys of Aquitaine and apaths of Merica, eating to much wasn't the way. When they got older as the sons of Dukes, all would become knights, and would need to be at the peak of their physical fitness, after his father and grandfather Ferdinand would also be king.

Though not much of a king if he keeps dallying with other guys like that, Jose thought as he spied the two of them cuddling one another again. It was cute, and Jose so much wanted to join them, but the thought of his fathers horror of his son engaging in any homosexual act put him off.
145321112.title: Say nothing...

choices: Ferdinand had gained 3 pounds, Carlos hadn't gained anything.
1453211122.content:
It was over two months into summer, and the sun hadn't got cooler, it had got hotter. There had been no exercise, and as a result of the excessive lunches Jose had gained weight, far more than a pound. He could feel it on his stomach. It had become soft and flabby, his belly button had become far deeper. He had tried and almost successfully put the idea of it to the back of his head after he decided not to mention it, and hadn't weighed himself since. Seeing Ferdinand and Carlos shirtless everyday had also meant that he hadn't noticed any change in them either. He had decided to chill and not get in their faces about it, and had succeeded, not only had he not noticed whether they had gained or not, he had failed to notice how chubby his stomach had got.

When he got up this morning he had for the first time seen his reflection in the mirror as he sat down, he had remembered 2 months ago thinking about his own tiny belly rolls when he sat forward. This morning he had seen just how big those rolls had become, sitting tilted only slightly forward they overhung by over an inch. The surprise had forced him to be late meeting Carlos and Ferdinand by the pool, so he could go and weigh himself.

Fortunately the palace was quite, and nobody had seen him slip into the room with the scales to use them. Even better nobody was even in the room. Nervously he stepped onto them, as the weights moved to find a balance with his body weight. After about 30 seconds the numbers began to appear: then eventually they did, 105.

105.... 105. He had gained over 9 pounds since he last weighed himself. He had been 94 at the beginning of summer, now he'd gained more than he'd even Ferdinand gained in the feasting season. Whilst still in shock he quickly snuck out of the room, to go and find Carlos and Ferdinand.
1453211122.title: Later that summer..

choices: Carlos and Ferdinand have gained more.
14532111221.content:
When he found them, both were already relaxing with some snacks.

"Hey Jose" Carlos said, "what kept you?"

"Yeah your like half an hour late" Ferdinand added.

Ferdinand looked at them both, they both also must have gained. It was unavoidable to notice Carlos, who had been really skinny like Jose. Carlos had become just as chubby, perhaps chubbier, like Jose his belly button looked deeper, and his stomach hung over his waist whilst sitting up. Ferdinand looked fatter, but Jose couldn't tell if he'd gained that much. Whilst he was slimmer earlier in summer, he already had a belly then too. It was unavoidable, he had to say something.

He sat down next to Ferdinand, "Yeah I know... I had to go weigh my self" Jose thought to be tactless, he wouldn't mention them at all, perhaps not even acknowledge they've gained anything, and hopefully they'll have noticed too.

"Really?" Carlos asked "you had too"

"Gained a few pounds looking at you" Ferdinand said lightly, jiggling the slight roll Jose had emerging over his waist, with his thumb and index finger.

"Yes" Jose replied, he was somewhat relived that they were taking it quite casually and not getting panicky or angry as he had imagined in his head, Ferdinand was even teasing Jose. "about 10 pounds since the start of summer to be specific" He continued candidly.

"Wow, ten? Really" Carlos sounded surprised.

"That's more than me in feasting season" Ferdinand teased, "I had noticed you were getting chubby"

Thus far they both seemed oblivious to themselves, only the surprise at Jose's weight gain. Jose was only slightly chubby after all, it's not as if he was 'fat' or overweight. "Have neither of you gained anything then?" Jose asked.

"Don't know, haven't weighed myself all summer" Carlos said.

"Same" Ferdinand added.

"I probably gained a couple of pounds, by belly is feeling a little soft" Carlos admitted. "Not like you fatty" Carlos joked as he pounced on Jose and started rubbing, poking jiggling his stomach. Jose laughed, he was ticklish, and he loved the feel of another guy touching him. Though he could feel Carlos's weight, he was quite heavy.

"Perhaps we should check though" Ferdinand suggested.
14532111221.title: Both had gained too.

145321112211.content:
They had all agreed to go weigh themselves, though they waited until lunch had been brought, and they had slept it off. Jose tried to restrain himself, and whilst eating more than he should have, did eat less than Carlos and Ferdinand.

Around two hours later made there way to the weighing room that Jose had gone to this morning, the palace was still rather quite, and the room in question was deserted. "Lets see your weight then Jose" Ferdinand said, suggesting that he should start them off.

Sure enough, he did, though unfortunately where it had been about 105 and a half this morning, lunch must have brought it up another half to 106. That was eleven pounds now, Jose suddenly felt far bigger.

"Wow, eleven not ten" Carlos said. "Don't worry I still love you" he joked as he started tickling Jose's stomach again. Jose loved it, but he could feel it jiggle which made him all the more self concious about his weight.

"Me next?" Ferdinand asked, he stepped on it felt like ages before it showed a result, the first number unsurprisingly was a 1 and not a 0, though to everyones shock the second number appeared, also a 1... before the final number settled on 6. That was 116 pounds.

"Wow dude! fifteen pounds!" Jose said, shocked. The number brought it home, he could see Ferdinand's stomach, it was preety large and it now actually hung over his waist at the front by almost an inch when he stood, as well as bulging over his sides.

"Guess, I've eaten more than you" Ferdinand said lightly as he tapped Jose's stomach. "I'm getting pretty fat"

Jose was surprised how calmly and casually Ferdinand had taken it, he was still over 10 pounds heavier than Jose, yet there was not a roll of belly fat on both their bellys that had moved the difference along the scale.

Carlos' turn this time, Jose didn't know how Carlos would take it. Looking at him he was sure he must have gained a fair bit, perhaps even more than himself. The numbers seem to settle quicker for Carlos than it did for Ferdinand. It settled on 112.

"Shit" Carlos said, truly shocked "What's that I've gained?"

"Errr... 17 pounds" Jose worked out.

"That's more than even me!" Ferdinand said.

Carlos appeared shocked, but not horrified. He quickly returned to his normal calm, happy mood. Looking at him, it was hard to see how they missed it. Ferdinand was still a fair bit heavier, over 10 pounds heavier than Jose and 4 pounds heavier than Carlos. But the fact that Carlos had been only 95 pounds, meant that he had gained the most. His priviously toned and slender stomach was now very soft. Though unlike Ferdinand, and to a smaller degree Jose, Carlos' stomach wasn't bulging over his sides, his belly was massive, considering how thin he'd been.

"Can't believe your belly's not bulging over your sides" Ferdinand noticed, "look at Jose and me". He drew attention to Jose's belly as well as his own. Jose's stomach was curving over his sides slightly, especially when wearing tight clothes.

"I know" Jose added.

"My belly's still pretty big you guys" Carlos reminded them.

"Sit down quickly" Jose said, guiding Carlos quickly towards a chair. When seated, his belly at the front protruded quite a bit, far more than what Jose's did. "there the belly" Jose said, taking a seat next to Carlos, he didn't feel as concious about his own stomach beside Carlos, it was hanging over his waist now, but it looked far less comparatively.

"There's 40 pounds of belly fat here guys!, including the weight I didn't drop earlier this year"
145321112211.title: Carlos and Ferdinand have gained more.

choices: They fall asleep, and maybe go into a bedroom together
1453211122111.content:
The three boys were truly amazed at how much weight they gained all together. 40 pounds of fat. Carlos and Ferdinand had started to space off, but Jose started thinking whether it was smart or not to keep on gaining weight.

"Hey guys, we better start exercising," Jose said.

"What?" The boys said as they were waking up from their daydreams.

"I said..." Then it occurred to Jose, it would take forever to lose all that fat. Also he sort of enjoyed being overweight, and he was pretty sure that the others were too. "Do you want to go find something else to eat?"

Obviously, Carlos and Ferdinand said yes. They headed out of the weighing room, and made their way to the place where they usually ate. Food was brought to three of them, and more than they usually receive. They couldn't help but eat and eat and eat. Surprisingly Jose let go and end up eating more than all of them. They then just sat there all bloated. Ferdinand and Carlos were cuddling, and Jose eventually joined in. He didn't care what anyone thought anymore.

"Wow. Jose you really packed in the food," Carlos said with a grin on his face.

"Yeah, you ate more than Carlos and I combined," Ferdinand added in.

"I know." Jose groaned. "I have to have gained at least five more pounds. Maybe we should go weigh ourselves again."

"Calm down, we just got back from the weighing room. We should just relax, maybe fall asleep to let our bellies adjust to the new weight." Ferdinand said.
1453211122111.title: "We better start exercising" says....

151.content:
Charles the Duke de Lyon was pacing around his study looking over his cluttered desk. His desk was filled with papers and maps. He was trying to create a schedule to organize all his social duties. The past several months there seemed to a few parties weekly thrown by the member of the Kings courts. Lunches, tea parties, balls, and weddings and more. He knew that many nobles would can many annoyances should Charles not be in their grace.

Charles stopped pacing and when to his window and looked outside and took a big breath let out a sigh to calm himself down. With the social duties he also trying to hear the gossip from other nations and see if they are on path of conflict. He stood in thought about how handle his problem. While he stood in thought he heard a knock on his study’s door.

“Enter. “he said with a command in his voice and she that the person behind the door was…
151.title: Charles ‘Charlie’, Duke de Lyon

choices: As Charles is working, Megan brings in a huge plate of sandwiches
One month later Charles gains muscle and fat
One month later Charles grows increasingly gluttonous
1513.content:
And the person that was behind the door was a beautiful servant dressed in a maid uniform. The woman was 5'9", a similiar complexion to Charles, brilliant green eyes, and fiery red hair.

Charles was at a loss for words as he took in the servant's beautiful form, but conposed himself when his gaze began to linger on her breasts.

"Pardon me Duke de Lyon," the servant said. "I am Megan Lovell. Your cousin recently hired me to help you organize your schedule. Only say the word and I shall be of assistance."

Megan curtsied before Charles. Charles was taken aback that Laurence would have the nerve to hire such an attractive woman to help him with his duties. Yet knowing Laurence, Charles knew that saying no to such a beautiful woman would be difficult.

"Just call me Charles. I'm glad that you came to help. Not only do I have to go to all these social events, but keeping tabs on Mercia and their wretched queen is no small task."

Megan stood up and nodded her head in agreement. "I can see. I even hear rumors that Laurence may be attempting to create a treaty with Mercia. His highness has the right mindset, but that harpy will play him like a puppet. So leave the social activities to me. I will inform of important key events and help you choose the best attire."

"A powerful man such as yourself must continue to keep tabs on Mercia and guide our king so he doesn't get decieved by that atrocious Queen Mary."

Charles looked at Megan and raised an eyebrow. Megan seemed to have a subtle boldness to her. Yet she had a point. Charles should focus on spying on Mercia and whipping Laurence into shape. Not only was Megan beautiful, but she was clever too.

If any other nobleman looked at her they would be falling for her. A woman like her would be smart enough to work her way into a position of power simply by marrying a noble.

"That's a splendid idea. Please start right away," Charles said.

"Very well Duke Charles. I shall start planning for Laurence's royal ball. I will fetch a memo and make a plan for you based on the theme. In the meantime, what would you like for lunch?"

Charles looked at the sundial on his resk and realized that he had forgotten about lunch. "I'll have a sandwich."

"Very well. I shall let the chefs know and bring you a sandwich," Megan said.

Megan curtsied and proceeded to do her duties. Charles was mesmerized by having a hot servant such as Megan around. Yet he couldn't find the nerve to ask her about her personal life just yet.
1513.title: A gorgeous servant

choices: Later that day, at the royal tailors...
153.content:
When people back home had said how different it would be in Mercia, Ezio hadn't understood just how much.

For a start despite being sunny, it was cold, bitterly, he was fortunate that he had a cloak to rap around him as they travelled to Rochester, the capital. Though that was nothing when compared to the first sight when entering the harbour; the Florentine shuttle they travelled on was dwarfed by the Mercian battleships and galleons, everyone in Florentine knows about the legendary Royal Navy of Merica, only seeing it first hand could Ezio could understand the power of this Kingdom. No wonder Florentine is so eager to be allied with them.

As Ezio, and his family, entered the Royal Palace and were guided toward there temporary accommodation, the palace's guest apartments, Ezio and his sisters, Margaret and Jane, gazed in fascination at their first sights of the court's formalities, style and fashions. Mercia wasn't so much famed for it's ostentatiousness like Aquitaine, but still this court must gave them a good run for there money. Margaret and Jane were mesmerized by the gowns, shoes and head dresses, the creative designs, the rich colours and jewels. The sheer beauty of it all had them both near infatuation.

Ezio too was fascinated by his surroundings, male fashions were also very different from back home, some of the most exotic and extravagant styles here would be considered quite feminine back home. To most, perhaps, but Ezio would disagree. His admiration went beyond the beautiful clothing, to those wearing it. Young blonde, pale and handsome Mercian boys, Ezio almost scratched himself for thinking of such a thing, about someone of the same gender. He forced himself to look away, as they moved past the bustling court rooms towards the guest apartments.

"Here we are" the servant guiding the family opened the door to reveal a spacious apartment. "Your arrival has been announced, I'm told a Lord of the Privy Council will be along before long to welcome you and make further arrangements"

"Much appreciated" Ezio's father replied graciously handing the servant a pouch of coin.

"Thank you very much, your excellency" The servant respectfully gave a slight bow. As he left the door closed heavily to a thump.

"Mother" Jane finally broke her silence, "when can we go clothes shopping"

"We look so drab, and our heads look positively naked!" Margaret added.

"You have nice clothes girls, don't belittle your god appreciated privileges"

"We'll need some new clothes" Ezio's father conceded, "It may be vanity on the girls parts, but we must be respectful of this court's traditions.... especially when we meet Queen Mary"

Ezio had disappeared into the room that was to be his, and lied on his bed and gave a large sigh, it was stressful and depressing suppressing his feelings, but it was his duty to his family and his city to do as expected of him. And other guys wouldn't fit into that. From his room, Ezio could hear a loud knock on the apparently door, he got up and entered the room as a servent opened the door and announced the visitor, the Duke of Northton.

"Your Grace" Ezio's father bowed, second's later Ezio, his sisters and mother followed suit.

"Your Excellency, I hope you've settled in" The Duke replied.

"Yes... it's a lovely city and palace. The girls are in awe"

The duke chuckled, "I am not surprised, court is an exciting place for ones so young. The Queen has informed me that as a welcome gift, you are all too place orders from the court tailors. She looks forward to meeting you tomorrow lunch time."
153.title: Ezio De Santis

choices: The following morning, preparing to meet Queen Mary
1533.content:
Ezio entered one of the chambers in the royal tailors, like the rest of the palace he'd seen so far, this room was extravagantly decorated. Steam through grates in the floor provided a warming heat to this room, though Ezio still found slightly cold. He nervously twitched and fiddled with his white tunic, as one of the tailors entered the chamber.

"Master Ezio" the tailor said cheerfully.

"Good afternoon" Ezio replied shyly.

"I hope your enjoying your new surroundings, Rochester is a wonderful city isn't it" the tailor chatted away.

"It is very beautiful" Ezio agreed.

"If you'd like to remove your tunic, so I can take your measurements"

"Okay" Ezio croaked, he turned away from the tailor and pulled of his tunic so's he was just wearing his braies. He discreetly turned back round to face the tailor who took his tunic from him and hung it on a wrack to the side.

"If you wouldn't mind standing on this box" the tailor motioned towards a black box, Even as he steped onto the box, Ezio still stood an inch bellow the tailor who was confidently measuring away. Ezio was very shy about his body, though in fact it was nicely tanned and he was quite attractive, he was self concious especially when it came to how thin he was.

"Thank you very much, Master Ezio" you may get dressed again, he smiled kindly.

"Thank you" Ezio replied.

"Your clothes will be delivered to you tomorrow morning"
1533.title: Later that day, at the royal tailors...

choices: Taking a tour with a Prince...
15331.content:
"You look wonderful Ezio" his mother commented upon his entry into the room. He felt so overdressed; on his upper body he was was wearing both a doublet and a jerkin along with slops, loosely fitting baggy trousers, cut to mid-thigh, all in such rich colours. To top it off he had a flat cap perched on top of his curly dark brown hair.

"I feel so overdressed, how can they wear so much?" He asked his mother, just as his sisters entered the room in ornate red dresses, topped with extravagant head dresses.

"Don't be a damp rag Ezio!" Margaret responded briskly.

"Yeah, how can you not like this dress" Jane added.

"Okay that's enough" his mother said sternly, guiding her three children toward the door, "your father met with members of the privy council an hour ago, and we're due to meet Queen Mary within the next fifteen minuets"

Lord and Lady De Santis stood with their children, Ezio, Jane, Margret, just out the throne room, as they waited to be received by Queen Mary. Ezio fiddled nervously with his sleeves as they waited, he shivered in anticipation. He hated meeting new people, and this Queen Mary was one of the most powerful people in the world, no doubt she was going to be intimidating, a women in a position in power was rare, especially in this case where her younger brother and uncle were both favoured for the throne, despite this she rules unopposed and peacefully within her own realm. Suddenly the doors swung open, and the 4 of them entered the massive room, and walked respectfully towards the throne.

"Your Royal Majesty" Lord De Santis gave a low bow, Ezio followed suit, as his mother and daughter gave equally low and sweeping curtsies. They remained down until the beautiful Queen Mary turned her hand indicating they should rise. Her clothing was so unique, it extruded a sense of wealth, power and authority, her head dress stood almost a foot high upon her lovely blonde hair.

"Excellency" She at last spoke, following up by a signal that they were told about earlier. In order of importance the family approached her, knelt, was given a blessing and kissed her hand. Ezio went third, after his mother but before his sisters. Ezio fealt even wose now, he had shaken like a leaf the whole time he knelt at her feat, he hoped she didn't get the wrong impression. Ezio heard another loud bang as a side door aproached and three figures entered,

"Allow me to introduce me my mother the dowager Queen Katherine" Queen Mary rose from her throne to introduce her family, Ezio shook more as it became clear that they were now going to meet the hole of the immediate and leading members of the royal family, and my brothers "Crown Prince James, and Prince George"

Stood next to the regal dowager Queen were two boys, the younger, George stood shorter and appeared somewhat chubbier than his older brother. James stood at roughly the same at Ezio, he was looked to be about the same age. Out of the three, he approached Ezio, bowing respectful to him.

"Your highness" Ezio returned the bow. He was having a hard time not swooning, Prince James was incredibly attractive, as the rumours had told, Ezio couldn't believe that he was choosing to speak to him.

"Master Ezio wasn't it" Prince James said softly in a friendly tone.

"Yes your highness... err Prince James" Ezio replied tensely, he was shaking more than before, half out of pure excitement.

"Your shaking... are you cold" Prince James asked kindly.

"Your country is far colder than mine....also truthfully I am very nervous around new company... I'm sorry" Ezio replied, he thought honestly served him better, he couldn't think of what else to say.

"No need sir, I hate these formal things two, your mother and father will likely be longer than you... once you are done it would be my pleasure to give you and your sisters a tour of palace" Prince James said, leaving by the side door without waiting for a reply.

Within minuets Lord De Santis signalled for Ezio, Margret and Jane to leave. The room outside was bustling, Ezio could help but wonder what they were discussing inside the throne room. Jane and Margaret caught the eye of boys, and left Ezio alone as they mingled and flirted with every boy they could. Ezio found a seat near the end of the room and prepared to wait for his mother and father to exit the room.

"Master Ezio" Prince James called from across the hall, bizarrely, nobles bowed as he strode across the floor towards Ezio. "Still up for that tour?"

"Yes of course your highness.... I can't see where my sisters are gone though"

"Their loss" Prince James joked in his sweet voice, "I guess it's just the two of us then" he tapped Ezio's shoulder and the two left the room.
15331.title: The following morning, preparing to meet Queen ...

choices: Accept the offer of help and follow Prince James
Say thanks but no thanks, Ezio had better be getting back.
153311.content:
Prince James lead Ezio up a grand looking flight of stairs, as they progressed the throng of people diminished until it was more or less just the two of them, punctuated by the odd Royal Guardsman.

"So what do you do for fun?" Prince James asked.

"Err... I doubt you'd consider my favoured past times.... fun" Ezio responded light heartedly, "I'm not really particularly fond of the parties and such."

"Haha, to look at you I didn't think you were a big party animal" he replied with a big grin on his face. "So..."

"I like reading... history mainly. Your country's is particularly interesting" Ezio noted.

"History.... hmmm, good choice, good choice" Prince James chuckled, "I wouldn't say parties were my 'favourite' thing either, but you know court life!"

"Yeah" Ezio croaked slightly.

"Though... a good looking guy like you would do well at court" Prince James pointed out.

"Thank you, your highness, but I don't thi..." Ezio started.

"I bet you had many admires back home in Florentine?" James continued.

Ezio previously fiddled with his hair, he wasn't use to conversation like this, not to mention that he had nothing to tell. It felt slightly pathetic, oh how he hated being so social awkward. What would he say, as the son of a leading noble he had met many girls, though he had taken little interest in them... in that way, and as far as he'd noticed they'd taken little interest in him.

"It's okay... I don't want to intrude"

"I... I erm, don't know... I don't think so" Ezio conceded honestly.

"I find that difficult to believe" Prince James tapped his hand gently on Ezio's shoulder as he said it. "Perhaps Mercian ladies will be different"

"Perhaps, I think they also found me dull" Ezio added, light heartedly, "you though.... girls as far as Florantine have talked of you, and now I can see why" Ezio looked slightly to the left at Prince James, he was one of the most handsome, cutest guys he'd ever seen, but it was painful to even acknowledge to himself that he was thinking such thinks.

"They've heard of me in Floreantine?" Prince James asked.

Ezio chuckled "you can't be surprised your highness...?"

"It's hard to say anything without saying vain" James joined in, "though I would lie that it's flattering, I wish they didn't" he added.

Part of his jerkin fealt like loose, Ezio couldn't help fiddling, but it was getting hard to hide the fact, but he didn't want to be rude.

"Are you okay?" James stopped moving so allow Ezio to sort himself out.

"These clothes are so fancy... they take getting use to"

"It looks like your jerkin has slipped" James pointed out.

"Damn..." Ezio muttered under his breath.

"Come with me and I'll help you retighten it" Prince James offered.
153311.title: Taking a tour with a Prince...

1533111.content:
"Thank you" Ezio accepted shyly. Prince James briefly took his hand, which began to tingle, and lead him to an large empty state room.

"It's no problem... you seem nice... and genuine." James complemented, much to Ezio's embarrassment, "so many people here are posers, liars and schemers. Trying to get near me to improve their position"

"I had no idea it was so tough" Ezio replied.

"It's not that bad... talking you just reminded me what it was like knowing someone who didn't have an ulterior motive" Prince James smiled warmly.

"How do you know that I don't?" Ezio asked curiously.

"We'll I can't know for sure, but if your acting your doing a bloody good job... though I can't think of two many people who would 'act' like you" He pointed out.

"I guess someone 'acting' might say the same.. but I don't" Ezio tittered.

"Haha, your right..." Prince James joined his laughing, "turn around and i'll retighten your jerkin"

"Thanks" Ezio turned around, Prince James placed his hand just above Ezio's waist, and pulled a loose cord, which caused the jerkin to slip off completely. On the one bellow, Prince James could see where the problem was, there was a sizable tear in the fabric, that had caused both jerkins to slip, and now in the case of the upper one, fall off.

"There's a large tear that has damaged the coupling" Prince James undid the bottom of the knot to he could retye it, this Jerkin was heavy though and unravelled the thread completely and fell to the floor with a thud. "I did not expect that to happen..."

Ezio suddenly felt really self concious, Prince James had found the problem, when he put it on earlier he must have torn the lower Jerkin and not tied either up probably. And now his midriff was exposed.

"Oh god, I'm really sorry" Prince James said sorry, trying not to look at Ezio, who he could see was visibly self conscious about what had just happened.

"No, no it's okay.. it's my fault.. these clothes are difficult to fathom"

"They are indeed. My valets normally do my own dressing.... so I'm afraid I'm not so much an expert" Prince James admitted. He looked carefully at Ezio, he had thought that Ezio to be wearing a corset or something... but he wasn't, he looked so thin. From just looking at his midriff, James could see Ezio's ribs, he looked as if he didn't eat anything.

"What?" Ezio asked nervously.
1533111.title: Accept the offer of help and follow Prince James

choices: Ezio returns to his family quarters
James offers to fatten Ezio up
15331112.content:
"Oh I'm sorry" James replied quietly. He still wasn't sure if he should say anything about it, after all it was none of his business. On the other hand, Ezio wasn't stupid and he had to say something, he'd sound as if he was lying otherwise.

"It's okay.." Ezio croaked "What?"

"It's just... just you're so thin" James said carefully, he didn't wish to offend or make Ezio uncomfortable.

"I am?" Ezio said, his phrasing indicated surprise, though his tone did not. "but then, so are you... and most of the guys I've seen thus far at court." he added.

"Perhaps, though you look substantially thinner. I'd thought you'd been Ill"

"No... I just eat very little. I've never gone about 120 standard pounds" He admitted, there was no point lying, James was very kind, and he'd never remembered talking to candidly to anybody.

James smiled, "I don't imagine any of the guys our age at court are that light... even I'm over a stone, 14 pounds, heavier than you. And I too am thin"

"Fourteen pounds heavier?" Ezio repeated in surprise.

"You'd be surprised, many of the guys you've seen so far at court are not actually as slim as they look. Court life has fattened most of them." James explained, as he just fished reattaching Ezio's jurkin.

"Not you?" Ezio asked.

"Well... I am perhaps a couple of pounds fatter than should be" James chuckled, he placed his hand on his stomach. This was perhaps slight exaggeration, James was extremely slender, though as had admitted the fattening cuisine at court meant that his stomach had a little belly fat on it.

"Should be?" Ezio smiled back, he hadn't been sure what to say. He was sure James must be exaggerating, he look so slim.

"Only after I started living at court permanently I gained a few pounds, which seems to have gone to my stomach."

"Don't you go thinking that people in Florentine are malnourished, I've always eaten less than the average guy my age." Ezio explained, he had loosened up and felt able to talk far more candidly to Prince James, without such a worry about what he should say next.

James chuckled, "Haha, I was wondering if I should ask if it was a Florentine thing! I thought it might sound a little tactless". Ezio grinned back at James, trying not to look into his eyes. "Court will soon fatten you up" he added.

Ezio appreciated the sentiment, and despite it's less serious nature he did hate being so gravely thin, though he self-consciously crossed his arms over his bare stomach.

"Anyway, lets get your jerkin back on" James lifted the jerkin from the floor and placed it around Ezio's chest, and tied it up as tightly as he could.
15331112.title: James mentions something.

choices: Ezio says thanks, but no thanks
153311122.content:
"There were often times where I'd felt like eating, but didn't have the apatite I expected when it came to it" He'd thought back to the times at the much smaller Florentine court where at parties, and other functions, he'd often feel like eating excessively but ultimately always decide not to. As he'd explained to Prince James many Florentines did eat this way, and unlike Mercians the far warmer climate meant hiding it was far more difficult. Traditionally because of this youths and younger adults would fast for a period before the hot season, it was seen as acceptable even appropriate; though only for males, never women; eating too excessively was seen as unlady like.

"I know how you feel... sort of" James replied, he had at last sat down after reattaching Ezio's jerkin, on a couch facing an arm chair that Ezio was perched in. "I can always help you fatten up. I'm at court permanently, and I know which food to eat and avoid" He grinned kindly. James's younger brother George use to be slender when he was about 12 or 13, in the years since he came to court he'd gotten rather fat, he was 14 now and James was sure that George probably weighed more than he did. Of course he wasn't overweight or anything, and his dress sense did a good job hiding his weight, but James had seen his podgy stomach.
153311122.title: James offers to fatten Ezio up

1533111221.content:
"Thank you, your highness" Ezio remembered formality. It was a nice gesture, even if he wasn't completely serious. He felt great relief at finally being able to talk about one of his greatest discomforts, his weight.

"That jerkin will fit in no time" James pointed out, he hadn't expected Ezio to say yes. It was a less than normal offer, and he of course didn't want to make Ezio fat; he just found it hard ignoring how uncomfortable Ezio was with being so thin. "I'll take you back to the main hall, if I have time before I have meet with the Queen...." he tailed off and lead Ezio back towards the main halls. As the two reproached the halls James lead Ezio toward a patisserie table. The pastry and cake table is always a good place to start, in my experence people with smaller appetites tend to have a sweet youth" he joked.

A selection of cake and pastry was served up onto two plates and delivered to a table near the internal fountain "This looks great" Ezio said to James.

"It does, doesn't it... dig in" James suggested.

The two dug into the plate of foods, James ate slightly more than Ezio did, but this was far more than Ezio ever ate in a whole day, let alone a single meal. Though considering how little he use to ate this was less significant than it sounds, but still he'd eaten allot. His stomach felt really bloated.

"Wow, I think I ate more than you did there" James noticed

"Yeah I noticed... I feel so bloated now, I don't know if I could have eaten anymore" Ezio rubbed his stomach.

"Me too Ezio... and you've got a bigger apatite than you thought."
1533111221.title: Skinny no longer

15331112212.content:
It had been a week since Ezio had last seen Prince James, he'd been called to meet with Queen Mary and sent to the South Marches, the boarder with Aquitaine. Ezio's father had mentioned how close this country was to war. The whole court was abuzz with it, though Ezio understood very little as to the reasons, it was all very complicated. He hoped that Prince James returned to court soon, he'd felt despite only knowing him briefly that he'd become pretty friendly. Over the course of the week Ezio had followed what James had suggested and had eaten allot of pastries, cake and other deserts... as well as the main meals he ate with his family.

James had been right about the apatite, Ezio had a bigger one than he'd thought, though by the time he was done he felt completely full. Sweet foods were also very tasty, of course it meant he had to brush his teeth harder, but at least he enjoyed it. Ezio wasn't sure how much it was working, his stomach did feel slightly softer. He was starting to feel more normal, less 'deathly skinny'.
15331112212.title: The following week

153311122122.content:
It was yet another week before James returned, eight days to be exact. The war hadn't happened, yet. James was recalled from the marches, as was many of the solders. Though he understood the Royal Legion was remaining there. Ezio had been relieved that James had come back safe, he didn't have too many friends at court, and he longed for some friendly company with someone he felt he got on well with. Further than that, Prince James had invited Ezio for afternoon tea at the Crown Prince's estate in the Palace complex.

Ezio had been pleased with the invitation, he had encouraged all his children to become friendly with courtiers to heighten their position, he was glad that Ezio had become friendly of someone of such high position, and wasn't flirting with every boy at court like his sisters, Margaret and Jane.

A carriage had taken Ezio to down the road to the Crown Prince's Estate, it was still attached to the main palace, but also formed it's own entity in the complex. He was still getting use to just how massive the palace was, it was like a city within a city. Ezio was shown into the estate by servant.

"Your highness" Ezio bowed upon seeing Crown Prince James.

James signalled for the servant to leave, who too bowed before leaving, shutting the double doors behind him. "Nice to see you again Master Ezio" James bowed respectfully back.

"Thank you for inviting me your highness"

"The pleasure is all mine" he replied "I enjoy your company... It's such lovely weather I thought we'd have afternoon tea in front of the pool"

"The pool?" Ezio asked, was he going to have to swim.

"For swimming..." James grinned, "it's the right time of year.... tea in the gardens or on the veranda is a far more formal occasion. You can swim okay right?"

"Oh yes, yes of course" Ezio answered quickly. He was glad it wasn't going to be too formal, with many other nobles watching, and other formalities such as drinking and stirring in a certain manor closely observed.

"Great" James said as he showed Ezio towards the pool.

Ezio looked impressed, they stood on the carefully crafted platform overlooking the pool, on it was two chairs and a table. It still looked pretty formal, though apart from guards at the far end, and standing at the doors, it was empty. Ezio felt a calmness emanating from the room, the vents from the main fires meant the room was lovely and comfortable. He and Prince James went into separate changing rooms, in Ezio's was a choice of swimming garments, he picked something white and simple, and placed a dressing gown around him, and headed out towards the table and chairs where James was sitting, wearing very similar swimming garments, as well as a loose gown that he hadn't tied up.

"Just in time, teas just arrived"
153311122122.title: James returns and invites Ezio for afternoon

1533111221222.content:
"Thank you" Ezio replied. There were scones, butter, cheese, bread, pastries of all sorts on a beautifully placed in the centre of the table, he sipped a cup of tea that had been poured.

"It's so nice to see you again Ezio, all I've heard is politics and military strategy for two weeks... it gets rather tiresome"

"It's really nice to see you too. I really didn't expect to be invited to this..."

Prince James lifted his gown off and placed it on the back of the chair, out of courtesy Ezio followed suit untying his own gown and placing it on the back of his chair. Prince James was so pale, in comparison to Ezio's own olive tanned skin. He couldn't believe he was seeing the Crown Prince shirtless, making him in Ezio's eyes looking even more attractive. James was slender, and had very little muscle mass, from what Ezio could tell. He could see the small amount of fat on the stomach that James had mentioned he'd have, it was both more and less than Ezio had expected, his belly button was also quite deep, considering he had very little fat. "You can see what I meant when we talked" James said as he appeared to have caught Ezio looking.

"About what?"

"What the food at court is like" James chuckled, "just looked at the portion they've served us up with"

"There's allot there" Ezio agreed.

"Well enjoy" James said taking a scone.

The two chatted and laughed as they ate and drunk their teas. Unlike the first time they'd eaten in the grand hall together, Ezio ate more than James. A fair bit more. James leant back in his seat as James just finished the last slice of chocolate cake. By the look of it James looked full. Ezio too was feeling quite full, though far more slowly than a few weeks back.

"Enjoy the cake" James said to Ezio as he finished the last bit of cake.

"It was delicious." Ezio replied, placing his folk on his plate and leaning back on his chair.

"It's added the extra pounds to my stomach, as you could see" James said, patting his bloated stomach.

"Yes" Ezio replied, looking at James's chest. Unlike his own it was bloated.

"As it has for you" James noted, looking at Ezio's chest. He was looking far fuller than what his midriff had shown when he reapplied his jerkin a few weeks back. James was actually surprised just how different he looked, more than just fuller, his ribcage was no longer visible and he had a fairly notable layer of flab lining his belly. Considerably more than James had expected after only a couple of weeks.

"I guess so, Ezio replied.

"Don't forget I saw your stomach when your jerkin fell off, because you were so thin." James pointed out. "We should swim before too long"

The two moved to sit next to the pool, their legs dangling in, as they sat up straight James observed Ezio who's belly fat formed a notable roll and hanged slightly over his waist, in this upright position. His own stomach also hung over slightly, at this angle. The deepness of Ezio's belly button just went to show how much flab there was on his stomach.

Ezio was in amazement, first Prince James had openly said that he thought that Ezio was getting fat, which left Ezio wondering if he should feel embarrassed or flattered. But he'd also prodded Ezio's stomach and jiggled it slightly, that certainly left him embarrassed, especially by the amount it jiggled. Now James had taken Ezio's hand and placed it on his stomach, his heart was beating with excitement on actually touching the body of this really nice and attractive guy. James stomach was also soft, owing for the lack of muscle, Ezio prodded slightly and it appeared to go less in than his own and jiggled to a lesser extent.

154.content:
As he had stepped off the boat Francesco had realised just how Castile was a different place, despite being in decline there was still an air of wealth and power in the nation that had not long ago been the most powerful in the known world. They'd sailed straight into the Port of Jaca, still a prominent trading outpost and more importantly Castile's capital city, not long after they departed the port Francesco, his mother and father had gotten into a gilded carriage that was to take them to the Royal Palace.

The visit was important to Francesco's father, Magistrate Alberto Morrette was the brother of Siecle's current Gonfaloniere, and since the Gonfaloniere was childless that would make Alberto his de'facto heir. If only de'facto was enough, Siecle had been plagued by instability caused by power grabs for decades now, the Morrette family had rightfully ruled the city for over a century, with many interruptions. This was the first time that the heir was a younger brother rather than a son, and Magistrate Alberto knew this would make his claim weaker, as many others will launch their own claims. Thus powerful allies were required, and who were more powerful than the King of Castile, the King of Aquitiane and the Queen of Mercia? Magistrate Alberto was confident that anyone ally would strengthen him enough to secure his bid. Especially given his knowledge about the Gonfaloniere's illness, that wasn't yet public knowledge. With any luck he will have his alliance struck, and will be able to take the seat of Gonfaloniere with out opposition when the time comes.

"Make sure you are on your best behavior Francesco" Alberto said sternly after he noticed the carriage draw up at the palace, "these continentals can be strict with formalities, you are not to speak out of turn, or unless permission is granted"

"Are they all like that?.. I thought only the Mercian's were so rigid" Francesco replied facetiously.

"I think they get worse the further north you go" Francesco's mother, Lady Elena, speculated, "the Aqutiaines may seem promiscuous but I've heard they're unyielding when it comes to formalities"

"Nice to have an open mind Elena" Alberto said sarcastically, "these people are important to me... to us. If you wish to be Gonfaloniere one day Frankie then you have to understand the importance of diplomacy."

"Yes father" Francesco said obediently, "atleast it's warm and sunny here!"

"Won't see much of that when we go north. Cold, wet and gloomy.. especially Mercia" Elena said, her prejudice toward the northern nations undisguised.
154.title: Lord Francesco Morrette

choices: The King will see you straight away.
1541.content:
As the carriage entered the Palace grounds Francesco could see just how much the Royal Palace was a symbol, a statement that told both it's citizens and foreigners of the power of Castile. In places, the Palace seemed more like a fortress, it had tall battlements and spires, solders in full armour lined the walls and high gates prevented anyone from entering uninvited. The carriage however took them around the side where the Royal Palace was grander and far more palace like. It stopped outside a great door where in line with a green carpet that had been placed for their benefit.

Francesco's father got out first, followed by his mother who rejoined Alberto next to her husbands side as Francesco still was stepping out the carriage. He shuffled along in order to catch his parents up. Beside the honour guard, there was nobody outside to meet him. Was that usual? Just as he was about to ask either of his parents, Francesco stopped himself. This wasn't a place where 'children' asked their parents questions, the idea of doing so did infuriate Francesco somewhat, though he didn't wish to show his father up infront of all the important people that could help secure his place, as well as Francesco's place as Gonfaloniere of Siècle.

"My Lord" a Castilian noblemen said bowing to Alberto, "My Lady... It is my immense pleasure to welcome to Castile."

"Thank you my Lord" Alberto started, "your city is beautiful, we are so pleased to be here."

Francesco tried not to smile at the complements, he imagined his father would give the exact same complements to the Aqutiaines and Mercians.

"Thank you" the noblemen smiled, as he guided them further into the palace, "as you should know the King is not in too good of health"

'Political speak for he's dying, no doubt', Francesco thought, as they walked he was constantly looking around, for boys his own age to start with... eventually anyone. The palace seemed deserted. 'Was the king dying keeping courtiers away' wondered, as they went though yet more rooms and corridors without seeing anyone.
1541.title: The carriage arrives at the Royal Palace

choices: The King is in good spirits.
The King is frail and unaware of his surroundings.

"I am afraid that you must see the King straight away... or not at all" the noblemen informed Alberto, "he is rarely able to attend court, so it'll be his wife Queen Isabella that you'll be dealing with for most of your stay."

"Very well" Alberto agreed after moments consideration, "is he expecting us."

"He was informed of your visit, despite his ill health there seems to be no problem with his memory" the noblemen explained.

The three were guided towards the throne room where the King was holding court, when they entered they were ushered to the side to await for the King to call them before him as he was currently dealing with others. From what Francesco could tell the King seemed quite on the ball for a man he had thought was dying, though he still looked to be very frail.

"Lord and Lady Morrette" a voice called, after they waited to the side for about fifteen minuets. Francesco waited until his mother and father had passed him, before taking up position a few paces behind them in the centre.

"This is Lord Alberto Morrette, Magistrate of Siècle. Your Majesty" the noblemen stood beside the King.

By this point Nicolas knelt as his father and mother had just done.

"It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance your Majesty" Alberto said respectfully.

"And I.. you, my Lord. D.ddid you say you were fro.. from Siècle" He asked.

"Yes your majesty" Alberto looked up as the Queen who was sat beside King Philip, she gave her husbands permission for them to stand. "May I present my wife, Lady Elena. And my son Francesco."

"A pleasure your Majesty" Elena curtsey to the King before standing aside next to her husband to let Francesco step forward.

"Your Majesty" was all Francesco could say. He was lost forewords in this King's presence, even though he wasn't actually suppose to say anything. He bowed low as his father had done, and stepped backwards to return precedence to his parents.

"A..and this is my wife" The King said, presenting the Queen.
